    if = {
        limit = {
            swiss_franc_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_swiss_franc_c_var_2
            add = swiss_franc_c_market_goods_buy_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_swiss_franc_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_swiss_franc_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_swiss_franc_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_swiss_franc_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_swiss_franc_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_swiss_franc_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_swiss_franc_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_swiss_franc_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_swiss_franc_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_swiss_franc_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_swiss_franc_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#belgian_franc
stockpiling_belgian_franc_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            belgian_franc_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_c_var_2
            add = belgian_franc_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_belgian_franc_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_belgian_franc_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_belgian_franc_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_belgian_franc_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_belgian_franc_c_1 = {
    set_variable = {
        name = circulating_belgian_franc_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            belgian_franc_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_belgian_franc_c_var_2
            add = belgian_franc_c_market_goods_buy_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_belgian_franc_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_belgian_franc_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_belgian_franc_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_belgian_franc_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_belgian_franc_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_belgian_franc_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_belgian_franc_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_belgian_franc_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_belgian_franc_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_belgian_franc_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_belgian_franc_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            luxembourgish_franc_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
            add = luxembourgish_franc_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_luxembourgish_franc_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1

            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_luxembourgish_franc_c_1 = yes

stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_luxembourgish_franc_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_luxembourgish_franc_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {

                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_luxembourgish_franc_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes

#mark
stockpiling_mark_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_mark_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            mark_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
            add = mark_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_mark_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_mark_c_1 = {
    set_variable = {
        name = circulating_mark_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            mark_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }

            name = circulating_mark_c_var_2
            add = mark_c_market_goods_buy_orders

        }

            name = circulating_mark_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_mark_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_mark_c_state_1 = yes

stockpiling_mark_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy

                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_mark_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_mark_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {

                                name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_mark_c_var_1

                        }

                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_finnish_markka_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_finnish_markka_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_finnish_markka_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_finnish_markka_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_finnish_markka_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#real
stockpiling_real_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_real_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_real_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_real_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            real_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_real_c_var_2
            add = real_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_real_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_real_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_real_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_real_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_real_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_real_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_real_c_1 = {
    set_variable = {
        name = circulating_real_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            real_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_real_c_var_2
            add = real_c_market_goods_buy_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_real_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_real_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_real_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_real_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_real_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_real_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_real_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_real_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_real_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_real_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_real_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#brazilian_real
stockpiling_brazilian_real_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            brazilian_real_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_c_var_2
            add = brazilian_real_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_brazilian_real_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_brazilian_real_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_brazilian_real_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_brazilian_real_c_1 = yes
}

    set_variable = {
        name = circulating_brazilian_real_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            brazilian_real_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_brazilian_real_c_var_2
            add = brazilian_real_c_market_goods_buy_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_brazilian_real_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_brazilian_real_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_brazilian_real_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_brazilian_real_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_brazilian_real_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_brazilian_real_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_brazilian_real_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_brazilian_real_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_brazilian_real_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_brazilian_real_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_brazilian_real_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#florin
stockpiling_florin_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_florin_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_florin_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_florin_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            florin_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_florin_c_var_2
            add = florin_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_florin_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_florin_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_florin_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_florin_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_florin_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_florin_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_florin_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_florin_c_1 = yes
}

    set_variable = {
        name = circulating_florin_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            florin_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_florin_c_var_2
            add = florin_c_market_goods_buy_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_florin_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_florin_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_florin_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_florin_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_florin_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_florin_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_florin_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_florin_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_florin_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_florin_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {

                                name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_florin_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }

    }

stockpiling_gulden_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_gulden_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            gulden_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
            add = gulden_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
            }
            change_variable = {

        }
    }
    stockpiling_gulden_c_state_1 = yes

                    has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency

                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy

                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {

                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }

                }

            every_scope_state = {

                        is_capital = yes

                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_c_var_1

                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {

                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {

                                name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

stockpiling_lira_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_lira_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            lira_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_2
            add = lira_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_lira_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_lira_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_lira_c_1 = {
    set_variable = {
        name = circulating_lira_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            lira_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_lira_c_var_2
            add = lira_c_market_goods_buy_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_lira_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_lira_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_lira_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_lira_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_lira_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#scudo_sardo
stockpiling_scudo_sardo_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            scudo_sardo_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
            add = scudo_sardo_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_scudo_sardo_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_scudo_sardo_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_scudo_sardo_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_scudo_sardo_c_1 = {
    set_variable = {
        name = circulating_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            scudo_sardo_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
            add = scudo_sardo_c_market_goods_buy_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_scudo_sardo_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_scudo_sardo_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_scudo_sardo_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_scudo_sardo_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_scudo_sardo_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_scudo_sardo_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_scudo_sardo_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_scudo_sardo_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_scudo_sardo_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            toscane_lira_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_c_var_2
            add = toscane_lira_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_toscane_lira_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }

stockpiling_toscane_lira_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_toscane_lira_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_toscane_lira_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_toscane_lira_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_toscane_lira_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_toscane_lira_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {

                                name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1

                        }

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            scudo_pontificio_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
            add = scudo_pontificio_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_scudo_pontificio_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }

                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes

                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site

                        }

                }
            }

        if = {

                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_scudo_pontificio_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }

                if = {
                    limit = {

                        is_capital = yes

stockpiling_ducato_c_1 = {

            add = ducato_c_market_goods_delta

        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_ducato_c_var_2
            multiply = 4

    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_ducato_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy

                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
