                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_ducato_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_ducato_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_ducato_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_ducato_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_ducato_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_ducato_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_ducato_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_ducato_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#ottoman_lira
stockpiling_ottoman_lira_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            ottoman_lira_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
            add = ottoman_lira_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_ottoman_lira_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_ottoman_lira_c_1 = {
    set_variable = {
        name = circulating_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            ottoman_lira_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
            add = ottoman_lira_c_market_goods_buy_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_ottoman_lira_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_ottoman_lira_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_ottoman_lira_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_ottoman_lira_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_ottoman_lira_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_ottoman_lira_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

stockpiling_swedish_krona_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            swedish_krona_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_c_var_2
            add = swedish_krona_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_swedish_krona_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_swedish_krona_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_swedish_krona_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_swedish_krona_c_1 = yes
}

        name = circulating_swedish_krona_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }

            swedish_krona_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }

        }
        change_variable = {

        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_swedish_krona_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_swedish_krona_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_swedish_krona_c_state_1 = yes

stockpiling_swedish_krona_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_swedish_krona_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_swedish_krona_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_swedish_krona_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_swedish_krona_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_swedish_krona_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_swedish_krona_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat

        name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            norwegian_krone_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_c_var_2
            add = norwegian_krone_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_c_var_2
            multiply = 4

                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site

                    has_law = law_type:law_danish_krone_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_danish_krone_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_danish_krone_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#czech_koruna
stockpiling_czech_koruna_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_czech_koruna_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            czech_koruna_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_c_var_2
            add = czech_koruna_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_czech_koruna_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_czech_koruna_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_czech_koruna_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_czech_koruna_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_czech_koruna_c_1 = {
    set_variable = {
        name = circulating_czech_koruna_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            czech_koruna_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_czech_koruna_c_var_2
            add = czech_koruna_c_market_goods_buy_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_czech_koruna_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_czech_koruna_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_czech_koruna_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_czech_koruna_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_czech_koruna_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_czech_koruna_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_czech_koruna_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_czech_koruna_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_czech_koruna_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_czech_koruna_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_czech_koruna_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

stockpiling_icelandic_króna_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_icelandic_króna_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_icelandic_króna_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_icelandic_króna_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_icelandic_króna_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_icelandic_króna_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {

                                name = stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_icelandic_króna_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100

                }
                not  = {

                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }

                        is_capital = yes

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100

                or = {

                }

                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }

                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes

                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site

                        is_capital = yes

                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {

                                name = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_estonian_kroon_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

        name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_c_var_2

            latvian_lats_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }

            name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_c_var_2
            add = latvian_lats_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_latvian_lats_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_latvian_lats_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_latvian_lats_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_latvian_lats_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_latvian_lats_c_1 = {
    set_variable = {
        name = circulating_latvian_lats_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            latvian_lats_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_latvian_lats_c_var_2
            add = latvian_lats_c_market_goods_buy_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_latvian_lats_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_latvian_lats_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_latvian_lats_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_latvian_lats_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_latvian_lats_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_latvian_lats_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_latvian_lats_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_latvian_lats_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_latvian_lats_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_latvian_lats_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_latvian_lats_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#lithuanian_litas
stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            lithuanian_litas_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
            add = lithuanian_litas_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_lithuanian_litas_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_lithuanian_litas_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_lithuanian_litas_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_lithuanian_litas_c_1 = {
    set_variable = {
        name = circulating_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            lithuanian_litas_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
            add = lithuanian_litas_c_market_goods_buy_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_lithuanian_litas_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_lithuanian_litas_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_lithuanian_litas_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_lithuanian_litas_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

stockpiling_zloti_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_zloti_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_zloti_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_zloti_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            zloti_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_zloti_c_var_2
            add = zloti_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_zloti_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_zloti_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_zloti_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }

            }

            }
        }

        }
    }
    circulating_zloti_c_1 = yes

        }

                    has_law = law_type:law_zloti_currency

                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {

                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_zloti_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_zloti_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }

        if = {

                has_law = law_type:law_zloti_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }

                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site

                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union

                }

stockpiling_drachma_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_drachma_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_drachma_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_drachma_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            drachma_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_drachma_c_var_2
            add = drachma_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_drachma_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_drachma_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
            }
            change_variable = {

        }

        }
    }
    stockpiling_drachma_c_state_1 = yes

    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {

                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {

                        is_capital = yes

                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_drachma_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_drachma_c_var_1

                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_drachma_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#mexican_peso
stockpiling_mexican_peso_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            mexican_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_c_var_2
            add = mexican_peso_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_mexican_peso_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_mexican_peso_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_mexican_peso_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_mexican_peso_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_mexican_peso_c_1 = {
    set_variable = {
        name = circulating_mexican_peso_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            mexican_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_mexican_peso_c_var_2
            add = mexican_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_mexican_peso_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_mexican_peso_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_mexican_peso_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_mexican_peso_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_mexican_peso_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_mexican_peso_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_mexican_peso_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_mexican_peso_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_mexican_peso_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_mexican_peso_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_mexican_peso_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#philippine_peso
stockpiling_philippine_peso_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_philippine_peso_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            philippine_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_c_var_2
            add = philippine_peso_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_philippine_peso_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_philippine_peso_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_philippine_peso_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_philippine_peso_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_philippine_peso_c_1 = {
    set_variable = {
        name = circulating_philippine_peso_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            philippine_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_philippine_peso_c_var_2
            add = philippine_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_philippine_peso_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_philippine_peso_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_philippine_peso_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_philippine_peso_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_philippine_peso_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_philippine_peso_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_philippine_peso_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_philippine_peso_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_philippine_peso_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_philippine_peso_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_philippine_peso_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#argentine_peso
stockpiling_argentine_peso_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }

        limit = {
            argentine_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_c_var_2
            add = argentine_peso_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_c_var_2
            multiply = 4

stockpiling_argentine_peso_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_argentine_peso_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes

                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_argentine_peso_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_argentine_peso_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_argentine_peso_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_argentine_peso_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {

                                name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_argentine_peso_c_var_1

                        }

                }
            }

                    has_law = law_type:law_chilean_peso_currency

                        is_capital = yes
