                                value = root.var:stockpiling_chilean_peso_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_chilean_peso_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_chilean_peso_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_chilean_peso_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_chilean_peso_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#colombian_peso
stockpiling_colombian_peso_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_colombian_peso_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            colombian_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_c_var_2
            add = colombian_peso_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_colombian_peso_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_colombian_peso_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_colombian_peso_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_colombian_peso_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_colombian_peso_c_1 = {
    set_variable = {
        name = circulating_colombian_peso_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            colombian_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_colombian_peso_c_var_2
            add = colombian_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_colombian_peso_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_colombian_peso_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_colombian_peso_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_colombian_peso_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_colombian_peso_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_colombian_peso_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_colombian_peso_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_colombian_peso_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_colombian_peso_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_colombian_peso_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_colombian_peso_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

stockpiling_cuban_peso_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_cuban_peso_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            cuban_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_c_var_2
            add = cuban_peso_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_cuban_peso_currency
            }
            change_variable = {

            }

            }

                name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_c_var_2

            }
        }

        }
    }
    circulating_cuban_peso_c_1 = yes

        name = circulating_cuban_peso_c_var_2

        }
    }
    stockpiling_cuban_peso_c_state_1 = yes

stockpiling_cuban_peso_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_cuban_peso_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_cuban_peso_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_cuban_peso_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_cuban_peso_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_cuban_peso_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_cuban_peso_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

        name = stockpiling_dominican_peso_c_var_2
        value = 0

            dominican_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0

        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_dominican_peso_c_var_2
            multiply = 4

                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75

                has_law = law_type:law_dominican_peso_currency

                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes

                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {

            }

        if = {

                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_dominican_peso_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union

                }

                        is_capital = yes

        value = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state
    }

        name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }

        limit = {
            uruguayan_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0

            }

                has_law = law_type:law_uruguayan_peso_currency

                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100

                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {

                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes

                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {

                                name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_uruguayan_peso_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {

                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#costa_rican_colón
stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            costa_rican_colón_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_c_var_2
            add = costa_rican_colón_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_costa_rican_colón_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_costa_rican_colón_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_costa_rican_colón_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_costa_rican_colón_c_1 = {
    set_variable = {
        name = circulating_costa_rican_colón_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            costa_rican_colón_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_costa_rican_colón_c_var_2
            add = costa_rican_colón_c_market_goods_buy_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_costa_rican_colón_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_costa_rican_colón_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_costa_rican_colón_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_costa_rican_colón_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_costa_rican_colón_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_costa_rican_colón_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#el_salvador_colón
stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            el_salvador_colón_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_c_var_2
            add = el_salvador_colón_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_el_salvador_colón_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_el_salvador_colón_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_el_salvador_colón_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_el_salvador_colón_c_1 = {
    set_variable = {
        name = circulating_el_salvador_colón_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            el_salvador_colón_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_el_salvador_colón_c_var_2
            add = el_salvador_colón_c_market_goods_buy_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_el_salvador_colón_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_el_salvador_colón_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_el_salvador_colón_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_el_salvador_colón_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_el_salvador_colón_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_el_salvador_colón_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

        value = 0
    }

            honduran_lempira_c_market_goods_delta > 0

    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_c_var_1

    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            nicaraguan_córdoba_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_c_var_2

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {

                        is_capital = yes

                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site

                                name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {

                    has_law = law_type:law_nicaraguan_córdoba_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }

                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes

                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {

                                name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_1

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_1

    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            guatemalan_quetzal_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
            add = guatemalan_quetzal_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1

            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2

            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_guatemalan_quetzal_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_guatemalan_quetzal_c_1 = {
    set_variable = {
        name = circulating_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            guatemalan_quetzal_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
            add = guatemalan_quetzal_c_market_goods_buy_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#rupee
stockpiling_rupee_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_rupee_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_rupee_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_rupee_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            rupee_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_rupee_c_var_2
            add = rupee_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_rupee_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_rupee_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_rupee_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_rupee_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_rupee_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_rupee_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_rupee_c_1 = {
    set_variable = {
        name = circulating_rupee_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            rupee_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_rupee_c_var_2
            add = rupee_c_market_goods_buy_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_rupee_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_rupee_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_rupee_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_rupee_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_rupee_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_rupee_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_rupee_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_rupee_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            pakistan_rupee_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_c_var_2
            add = pakistan_rupee_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_pakistan_rupee_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_pakistan_rupee_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_pakistan_rupee_c_1 = yes

        name = circulating_pakistan_rupee_c_var_2

        }

        }
    }
    stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_c_state_1 = yes

stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_pakistan_rupee_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_pakistan_rupee_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_pakistan_rupee_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            nepalese_rupee_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_c_var_2
            add = nepalese_rupee_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_nepalese_rupee_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_nepalese_rupee_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_c_var_1

        }
    }

    }

stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_nepalese_rupee_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_nepalese_rupee_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_nepalese_rupee_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy

                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_yen_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_yen_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_yen_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#peseta
stockpiling_peseta_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_peseta_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_peseta_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_peseta_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            peseta_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_peseta_c_var_2
            add = peseta_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_peseta_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_peseta_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_peseta_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_peseta_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_peseta_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_peseta_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_peseta_c_1 = {
    set_variable = {
        name = circulating_peseta_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            peseta_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_peseta_c_var_2
            add = peseta_c_market_goods_buy_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_peseta_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_peseta_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_peseta_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_peseta_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_peseta_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_peseta_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_peseta_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_peseta_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

            add = ruble_c_market_goods_delta
        }

            name = stockpiling_ruble_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }

    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_ruble_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_ruble_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_ruble_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_ruble_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_ruble_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_ruble_c_var_1

                        }
                    }
                }
            }

        if = {

                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_ruble_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75

                }
                not  = {

                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }

                        is_capital = yes

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75

                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }

                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes

                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
