stockpiling_hungarian_forint_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            hungarian_forint_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
            add = hungarian_forint_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_hungarian_forint_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_hungarian_forint_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_hungarian_forint_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_hungarian_forint_c_1 = {
    set_variable = {
        name = circulating_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            hungarian_forint_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
            add = hungarian_forint_c_market_goods_buy_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_hungarian_forint_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_hungarian_forint_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_hungarian_forint_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_hungarian_forint_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_hungarian_forint_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_hungarian_forint_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_hungarian_forint_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_hungarian_forint_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_hungarian_forint_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#dinar
stockpiling_dinar_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_dinar_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
            add = dinar_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_dinar_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_dinar_c_1 = {
    set_variable = {
        name = circulating_dinar_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_dinar_c_var_2
            add = dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_dinar_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_dinar_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_dinar_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_dinar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dinar_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state
    }

        name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }

        limit = {
            algerian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
            add = algerian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_algerian_dinar_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }

            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_c_var_2

            }

stockpiling_algerian_dinar_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_algerian_dinar_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_algerian_dinar_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_algerian_dinar_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_algerian_dinar_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_algerian_dinar_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_algerian_dinar_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            bahraini_dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_c_var_2
            add = bahraini_dinar_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_bahraini_dinar_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_bahraini_dinar_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_c_var_2

            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_c_var_1

        }
    }

    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_bahraini_dinar_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }

            every_scope_state = {

                        is_capital = yes

                                name = stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_bahraini_dinar_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_bahraini_dinar_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_iraqi_dinar_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_iraqi_dinar_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#jordanian_dinar
stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            jordanian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_c_var_2
            add = jordanian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_jordanian_dinar_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_jordanian_dinar_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_jordanian_dinar_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_jordanian_dinar_c_1 = {
    set_variable = {
        name = circulating_jordanian_dinar_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            jordanian_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_jordanian_dinar_c_var_2
            add = jordanian_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_jordanian_dinar_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_jordanian_dinar_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_jordanian_dinar_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_jordanian_dinar_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_jordanian_dinar_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_jordanian_dinar_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

stockpiling_libyan_dinar_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            libyan_dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
            add = libyan_dinar_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_libyan_dinar_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0

                has_law = law_type:law_libyan_dinar_currency
            }
            change_variable = {

            }

            name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
        }

stockpiling_libyan_dinar_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_libyan_dinar_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_libyan_dinar_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_libyan_dinar_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_libyan_dinar_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_libyan_dinar_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes

                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site

                                value = root.var:stockpiling_libyan_dinar_c_var_1

                        }
                    }
                }
            }

stockpiling_serbian_dinar_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            serbian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }

            add = serbian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {

                var:devaluation_on = 1

                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_serbian_dinar_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy

                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {

                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union

                        is_capital = yes

                    scope:central_bank_site = {

                                name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_serbian_dinar_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_serbian_dinar_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_1

                        }

                }
            }
        }
        if = {

                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_serbian_dinar_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }

            every_scope_state = {

                        is_capital = yes

                            }

                    }
                }
            }

        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_tunisian_dinar_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100

                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_tunisian_dinar_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#yugoslav_dinar
stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            yugoslav_dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
            add = yugoslav_dinar_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_yugoslav_dinar_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_yugoslav_dinar_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_yugoslav_dinar_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_yugoslav_dinar_c_1 = {
    set_variable = {
        name = circulating_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            yugoslav_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
            add = yugoslav_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_yugoslav_dinar_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_yugoslav_dinar_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_yugoslav_dinar_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            tuareg_ouguiya_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
            add = tuareg_ouguiya_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }

            }
            change_variable = {

                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_tuareg_ouguiya_c_1 = yes

        }
    }

stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }

                    limit = {

                        is_capital = yes

                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site

                                value = root.var:stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_1
                            }

    }

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100

                    }
                }

                        is_capital = yes

stockpiling_omanian_rial_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            omanian_rial_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {

        }

            name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_c_var_2
            multiply = 4

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100

                or = {

                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }

                        is_capital = yes

                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site

                        }

                }
            }
        }
        if = {

                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_omanian_rial_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union

                        is_capital = yes

                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site

                                name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_omanian_rial_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
