#qatari_riyal
stockpiling_qatari_riyal_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            qatari_riyal_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_c_var_2
            add = qatari_riyal_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_qatari_riyal_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_qatari_riyal_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_qatari_riyal_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_qatari_riyal_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_qatari_riyal_c_1 = {
    set_variable = {
        name = circulating_qatari_riyal_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            qatari_riyal_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_qatari_riyal_c_var_2
            add = qatari_riyal_c_market_goods_buy_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_qatari_riyal_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_qatari_riyal_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_qatari_riyal_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_qatari_riyal_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_qatari_riyal_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_qatari_riyal_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_qatari_riyal_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_qatari_riyal_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_qatari_riyal_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_qatari_riyal_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_qatari_riyal_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#saudi_riyal
stockpiling_saudi_riyal_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            saudi_riyal_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
            add = saudi_riyal_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_saudi_riyal_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_saudi_riyal_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_saudi_riyal_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_saudi_riyal_c_1 = {
    set_variable = {
        name = circulating_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            saudi_riyal_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
            add = saudi_riyal_c_market_goods_buy_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_saudi_riyal_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_saudi_riyal_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_saudi_riyal_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_saudi_riyal_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_saudi_riyal_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_saudi_riyal_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_saudi_riyal_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_saudi_riyal_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_saudi_riyal_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#yuan
stockpiling_yuan_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_yuan_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_yuan_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_yuan_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            yuan_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_yuan_c_var_2
            add = yuan_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_yuan_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_yuan_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_yuan_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_yuan_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_yuan_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_yuan_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_yuan_c_1 = {
    set_variable = {
        name = circulating_yuan_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            yuan_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_yuan_c_var_2
            add = yuan_c_market_goods_buy_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_yuan_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_yuan_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_yuan_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_yuan_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_yuan_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_yuan_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_yuan_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_yuan_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#korean_won
stockpiling_korean_won_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_korean_won_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_korean_won_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_korean_won_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            korean_won_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_korean_won_c_var_2
            add = korean_won_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_korean_won_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_korean_won_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_korean_won_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_korean_won_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_korean_won_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_korean_won_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_korean_won_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_korean_won_c_1 = yes
}

    set_variable = {
        name = circulating_korean_won_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            korean_won_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_korean_won_c_var_2
            add = korean_won_c_market_goods_buy_orders

            multiply = 4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_korean_won_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_korean_won_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_korean_won_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_korean_won_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_korean_won_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_korean_won_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_korean_won_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_korean_won_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_korean_won_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_korean_won_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_korean_won_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_korean_won_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_korean_won_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

stockpiling_baht_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat

        name = stockpiling_baht_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_baht_state

            baht_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_baht_c_var_2
            add = baht_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_baht_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_baht_currency

        name = circulating_baht_c_var_2

            name = circulating_baht_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_baht_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_baht_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_baht_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_baht_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_baht_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_baht_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_baht_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_baht_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_baht_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_baht_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_baht_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_baht_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#tical
stockpiling_tical_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_tical_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_tical_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_tical_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            tical_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_tical_c_var_2
            add = tical_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_tical_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_tical_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_tical_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_tical_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_tical_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_tical_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_tical_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_tical_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_tical_c_1 = {
    set_variable = {
        name = circulating_tical_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            tical_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_tical_c_var_2
            add = tical_c_market_goods_buy_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_tical_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_tical_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_tical_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_tical_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_tical_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_tical_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_tical_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_tical_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_tical_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_tical_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_tical_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_tical_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_tical_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_tical_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat

    }

        name = stockpiling_qiran_c_var_2

    }

            qiran_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_qiran_c_var_2
            add = qiran_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_qiran_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
            }

        }
    }
    stockpiling_qiran_c_state_1 = yes

stockpiling_qiran_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_qiran_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_qiran_c_var_1

                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {

                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }

            every_scope_state = {

                        is_capital = yes

                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site

                                name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_qiran_c_var_1

#south_african_rand
stockpiling_south_african_rand_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            south_african_rand_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_c_var_2
            add = south_african_rand_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_south_african_rand_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_south_african_rand_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_c_var_2

            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_south_african_rand_c_var_2
        }
    }

        name = circulating_south_african_rand_c_var_2

        }
    }
    stockpiling_south_african_rand_c_state_1 = yes

stockpiling_south_african_rand_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_south_african_rand_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes

                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_south_african_rand_c_var_1

                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_south_african_rand_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_south_african_rand_c_var_1

                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_south_african_rand_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {

                                name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_south_african_rand_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50

                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }

                        is_capital = yes

                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_nigerian_naira_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_nigerian_naira_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#ghanaian_cedi
stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            ghanaian_cedi_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_2
            add = ghanaian_cedi_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_ghanaian_cedi_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_ghanaian_cedi_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_ghanaian_cedi_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_ghanaian_cedi_c_1 = {
    set_variable = {
        name = circulating_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            ghanaian_cedi_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_2
            add = ghanaian_cedi_c_market_goods_buy_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_ghanaian_cedi_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_ghanaian_cedi_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_ghanaian_cedi_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

            sierra_leonean_leone_c_market_goods_delta > 0

        }
        change_variable = {

            }

            }

            name = stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_sierra_leonean_leone_c_1 = yes

        name = circulating_sierra_leonean_leone_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            sierra_leonean_leone_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_sierra_leonean_leone_c_var_2
            add = sierra_leonean_leone_c_market_goods_buy_orders
        }

            name = circulating_sierra_leonean_leone_c_var_2

        }

            add = var:circulating_sierra_leonean_leone_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_sierra_leonean_leone_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_sierra_leonean_leone_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_sierra_leonean_leone_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

        value = 0

            west_african_eco_c_market_goods_delta > 0

            add = west_african_eco_c_market_goods_delta

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100

                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }

                        is_capital = yes

                        is_capital = yes

#east_african_eco
stockpiling_east_african_eco_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_east_african_eco_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            east_african_eco_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_c_var_2
            add = east_african_eco_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_east_african_eco_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_east_african_eco_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_east_african_eco_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_east_african_eco_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_east_african_eco_c_1 = {
    set_variable = {
        name = circulating_east_african_eco_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            east_african_eco_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_east_african_eco_c_var_2
            add = east_african_eco_c_market_goods_buy_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_east_african_eco_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_east_african_eco_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_east_african_eco_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_east_african_eco_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_east_african_eco_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_east_african_eco_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_east_african_eco_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_east_african_eco_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_east_african_eco_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_east_african_eco_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_east_african_eco_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#ethiopian_birr
stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_c_1 = {
    #######################################################################
    #cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_c_var_1
        value = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state
    }
    #######################################################################

    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            ethiopian_birr_c_market_goods_delta > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
            add = ethiopian_birr_c_market_goods_delta
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:devaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_ethiopian_birr_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                #money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
                var:revaluation_on = 1
                has_law = law_type:law_ethiopian_birr_currency
            }
            change_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
                add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
            }
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_c_var_1
            add = var:stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
        }
    }
    circulating_ethiopian_birr_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_ethiopian_birr_c_1 = {
    set_variable = {
        name = circulating_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            ethiopian_birr_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
            add = ethiopian_birr_c_market_goods_buy_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_ethiopian_birr_c_var_1
            add = var:circulating_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
        }
    }
    stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_c_state_1 = {
    if = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                AND = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_ethiopian_birr_currency
                    money_supply < money_value_target
                    any_scope_building = {
                        or = {
                            has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_25
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_50
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_75
                            has_active_production_method = pm_revaluation_100
                        }
                    }
                    not  = {
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_law = law_type:law_ethiopian_birr_currency
                any_scope_building = {
                    or = {
                        has_active_production_method = pm_no_monetary_policy #à voir

                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_25
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_50
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_75
                        has_active_production_method = pm_devaluation_100
                    }
                }
                or = {
                    var:devaluation_on = 1
                }
                not  = {
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_c_var_1 
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not  = {
                    has_law = law_type:law_ethiopian_birr_currency
                    or = {
                        is_subject = yes
                        is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                    }
                }
            }
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    save_scope_as = central_bank_site
                    scope:central_bank_site = {
                        if = {
                            set_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1
                                value = root.var:stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_c_var_1
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

stockpiling_capital_state_transfert = {
    every_scope_state = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                is_capital = yes
            }
            save_scope_as = central_bank_site_capital
        }

        if = {
            limit = {
                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                is_capital = no
            }
            save_scope_as = central_bank_site_no_capital

            #actual Capital
            scope:central_bank_site_capital = {

                #gold
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = {
                        scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
                            add = var:central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        }
                    }
                }

                #Financial product
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_bond_var_state_1
                    add = {
                        scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
                            add = var:stockpiling_bond_var_state_1
                        }
                    }
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_company_stock_var_state_1
                    add = {
                        scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
                            add = var:stockpiling_company_stock_var_state_1
                        }
                    }
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_mining_stock_var_state_1
                    add = {
                        scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
                            add = var:stockpiling_mining_stock_var_state_1
                        }
                    }
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_railroad_stock_var_state_1
                    add = {
                        scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
                            add = var:stockpiling_railroad_stock_var_state_1
                        }
                    }
                }

                #Goods
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_grain_state_1
                    add = {
                        scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
                            add = var:stockpiling_grain_state_1
                        }
                    }
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_wood_state_1
                    add = {
                        scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
                            add = var:stockpiling_wood_state_1
                        }
                    }
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_coal_state_1
                    add = {
                        scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
                            add = var:stockpiling_coal_state_1
                        }
                    }
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_iron_state_1
                    add = {
                        scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
                            add = var:stockpiling_iron_state_1
                        }
                    }
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_sulfur_state_1
                    add = {
                        scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
                            add = var:stockpiling_sulfur_state_1
                        }
                    }
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_lead_state_1
                    add = {
                        scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
                            add = var:stockpiling_lead_state_1

                    }

                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_oil_state_1

                    name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state_1
                    value = 0
                }

                    name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_1
                    value = 0
                }

                    value = 0
                }

                    value = 0
                }

                    value = 0
