                        name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_luxembourgish_franc_seller.stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_luxembourgish_franc_seller.stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_luxembourgish_franc_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_luxembourgish_franc_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_luxembourgish_franc = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_luxembourgish_franc_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_luxembourgish_franc_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_luxembourgish_franc_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_luxembourgish_franc_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_luxembourgish_franc_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_luxembourgish_franc_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_luxembourgish_franc_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_luxembourgish_franc_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_luxembourgish_franc_seller.stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_luxembourgish_franc_seller.stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_luxembourgish_franc_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_luxembourgish_franc_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#mark
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_mark = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_mark_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_mark_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_mark_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_mark_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_mark_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_mark_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_mark_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_mark_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_mark_seller.stockpiling_mark_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_mark_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_mark_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_mark_seller.stockpiling_mark_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_mark_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_mark_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_mark_seller.stockpiling_mark_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_mark_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_mark_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_mark_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_mark_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_mark = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_mark_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_mark_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_mark_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_mark_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_mark_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_mark_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_mark_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_mark_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_mark_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_mark_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_mark_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_mark_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_mark_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_mark_seller.stockpiling_mark_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_mark_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_mark_seller.stockpiling_mark_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_mark_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_mark_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_mark_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_mark_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#finnish_markka
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_finnish_markka = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_finnish_markka_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_finnish_markka_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_finnish_markka_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_finnish_markka_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_finnish_markka_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_finnish_markka_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_finnish_markka_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_finnish_markka_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_finnish_markka_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_finnish_markka_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_finnish_markka_seller.stockpiling_finnish_markka_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_finnish_markka_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_finnish_markka_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_finnish_markka_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_finnish_markka_seller.stockpiling_finnish_markka_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_finnish_markka_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_finnish_markka_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_finnish_markka_seller.stockpiling_finnish_markka_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_finnish_markka_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_finnish_markka_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_finnish_markka_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_finnish_markka_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_finnish_markka_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }

ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_real = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_real_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_real_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_real_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_real_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_real_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_real_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_real_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_real_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_real_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_real_seller.stockpiling_real_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_real_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_real_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_real_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_real_seller.stockpiling_real_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_real_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_real_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast

                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_real_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_real_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

                        is_capital = yes

                        subtract = scope:gold_to_real_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_real_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {

                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_real_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_real_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }

                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_brazilian_real_seller.stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_brazilian_real_seller.stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_brazilian_real_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_brazilian_real_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_brazilian_real = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_brazilian_real_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_brazilian_real_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_brazilian_real_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_brazilian_real_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_brazilian_real_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_brazilian_real_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_brazilian_real_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_brazilian_real_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_brazilian_real_seller.stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_brazilian_real_seller.stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_brazilian_real_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_brazilian_real_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#florin
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_florin = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_florin_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_florin_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_florin_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_florin_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_florin_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_florin_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_florin_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_florin_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_florin_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_florin_seller.stockpiling_florin_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_florin_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_florin_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_florin_seller.stockpiling_florin_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_florin_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_florin_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_florin_seller.stockpiling_florin_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_florin_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_florin_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_florin_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_florin_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_florin = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_florin_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_florin_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_florin_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_florin_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_florin_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_florin_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_florin_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_florin_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_florin_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_florin_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_florin_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_florin_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_florin_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_florin_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_florin_seller.stockpiling_florin_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_florin_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_florin_seller.stockpiling_florin_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_florin_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_florin_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_florin_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_florin_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#gulden
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_gulden = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_gulden_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_gulden_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_gulden_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_gulden_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_gulden_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_gulden_seller.stockpiling_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_gulden_seller.stockpiling_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_gulden_seller.stockpiling_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_gulden_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_gulden_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_gulden_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }

                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_scudo_sardo_seller.stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_scudo_sardo_seller.stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_scudo_sardo_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_scudo_sardo_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_scudo_sardo = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_scudo_sardo_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_scudo_sardo_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_scudo_sardo_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_scudo_sardo_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_scudo_sardo_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_scudo_sardo_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_scudo_sardo_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_scudo_sardo_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_scudo_sardo_seller.stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_scudo_sardo_seller.stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_scudo_sardo_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_scudo_sardo_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#toscane_lira
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_toscane_lira = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_toscane_lira_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_toscane_lira_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_toscane_lira_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_toscane_lira_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_toscane_lira_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_toscane_lira_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_toscane_lira_seller.stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_toscane_lira_seller.stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_toscane_lira_seller.stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_toscane_lira_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_toscane_lira_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_toscane_lira = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_toscane_lira_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_toscane_lira_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_toscane_lira_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_toscane_lira_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_toscane_lira_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_toscane_lira_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_toscane_lira_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_toscane_lira_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_toscane_lira_seller.stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_toscane_lira_seller.stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_toscane_lira_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_toscane_lira_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#scudo_pontificio
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_scudo_pontificio = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_scudo_pontificio_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_scudo_pontificio_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_scudo_pontificio_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_scudo_pontificio_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_scudo_pontificio_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_scudo_pontificio_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_scudo_pontificio_seller.stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_scudo_pontificio_seller.stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_scudo_pontificio_seller.stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_scudo_pontificio_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_scudo_pontificio_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_scudo_pontificio_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_scudo_pontificio_to_gold
    }

        save_scope_as = gold_to_scudo_pontificio_seller
    }

                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes

                set_variable = {

                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_1_selle_in_gold

                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_scudo_pontificio_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_scudo_pontificio_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_1_selle_in_gold

                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_scudo_pontificio_seller.stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_scudo_pontificio_seller.stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_scudo_pontificio_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_scudo_pontificio_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#ducato
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_ducato = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_ducato_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_ducato_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_ducato_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_ducato_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_ducato_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_ducato_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_ducato_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_ducato_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_ducato_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_ducato_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_ducato_seller.stockpiling_ducato_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_ducato_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_ducato_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_ducato_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_ducato_seller.stockpiling_ducato_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_ducato_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_ducato_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_ducato_seller.stockpiling_ducato_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_ducato_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ducato_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ducato_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_ducato_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_ducato_state_1_selle_in_gold

        }

    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_ottoman_lira_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_ottoman_lira_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_ottoman_lira_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_ottoman_lira_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_ottoman_lira_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_ottoman_lira_seller.stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_ottoman_lira_seller.stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_ottoman_lira_seller.stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ottoman_lira_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ottoman_lira_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_ottoman_lira = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_ottoman_lira_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_ottoman_lira_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_ottoman_lira_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_ottoman_lira_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_ottoman_lira_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_ottoman_lira_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_ottoman_lira_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_ottoman_lira_seller.stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_ottoman_lira_seller.stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ottoman_lira_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ottoman_lira_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#swedish_krona
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_swedish_krona = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_swedish_krona_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_swedish_krona_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_swedish_krona_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_swedish_krona_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_swedish_krona_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_swedish_krona_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_swedish_krona_seller.stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_swedish_krona_seller.stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_swedish_krona_seller.stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_swedish_krona_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_swedish_krona_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_swedish_krona = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_swedish_krona_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_swedish_krona_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_swedish_krona_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_swedish_krona_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_swedish_krona_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_swedish_krona_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_swedish_krona_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_swedish_krona_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_swedish_krona_seller.stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_swedish_krona_seller.stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_swedish_krona_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_swedish_krona_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#norwegian_krone
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_norwegian_krone = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_norwegian_krone_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_norwegian_krone_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_norwegian_krone_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_norwegian_krone_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_norwegian_krone_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_norwegian_krone_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_norwegian_krone_seller.stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_norwegian_krone_seller.stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_norwegian_krone_seller.stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_norwegian_krone_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_norwegian_krone_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_norwegian_krone = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_norwegian_krone_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_norwegian_krone_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_norwegian_krone_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_norwegian_krone_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_1_selle_in_gold

                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_norwegian_krone_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation

                    add = var:stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_1_selle_in_gold

                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_norwegian_krone_to_gold = {

                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
