                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_norwegian_krone_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_norwegian_krone_seller.stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_norwegian_krone_seller.stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_norwegian_krone_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_norwegian_krone_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

            is_player = yes

    }

        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_danish_krone_currency
        }

    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_danish_krone_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_danish_krone_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_danish_krone_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_danish_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_danish_krone_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_danish_krone_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_danish_krone_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes

                        name = stockpiling_danish_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_danish_krone_seller.stockpiling_danish_krone_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_danish_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_danish_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold

                        name = stockpiling_danish_krone_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_danish_krone_seller.stockpiling_danish_krone_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset

                        name = stockpiling_danish_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_danish_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_danish_krone_seller.stockpiling_danish_krone_state_buy_vriablity

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_danish_krone_state_buy_vriablity > 1

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_danish_krone_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_danish_krone_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_danish_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification

                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_danish_krone_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_danish_krone_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_danish_krone_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_danish_krone_seller.stockpiling_danish_krone_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_danish_krone_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_danish_krone_seller.stockpiling_danish_krone_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_danish_krone_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_danish_krone_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_danish_krone_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_danish_krone_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#czech_koruna
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_czech_koruna = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_czech_koruna_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_czech_koruna_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_czech_koruna_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_czech_koruna_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_czech_koruna_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_czech_koruna_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_czech_koruna_seller.stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_czech_koruna_seller.stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_czech_koruna_seller.stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_czech_koruna_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_czech_koruna_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_czech_koruna = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_czech_koruna_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_czech_koruna_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_czech_koruna_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_czech_koruna_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_czech_koruna_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_czech_koruna_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_czech_koruna_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_czech_koruna_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_czech_koruna_seller.stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_czech_koruna_seller.stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_czech_koruna_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_czech_koruna_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#icelandic_króna
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_icelandic_króna = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_icelandic_króna_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_icelandic_króna_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_icelandic_króna_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_icelandic_króna_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_icelandic_króna_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_icelandic_króna_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_icelandic_króna_seller.stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_icelandic_króna_seller.stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_icelandic_króna_seller.stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_icelandic_króna_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_icelandic_króna_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_icelandic_króna = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_icelandic_króna_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_icelandic_króna_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_icelandic_króna_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_icelandic_króna_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_icelandic_króna_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_icelandic_króna_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_icelandic_króna_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_icelandic_króna_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_icelandic_króna_seller.stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_icelandic_króna_seller.stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_icelandic_króna_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_icelandic_króna_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_slovak_koruna_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_slovak_koruna_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_slovak_koruna_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_slovak_koruna_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_slovak_koruna_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_slovak_koruna_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_slovak_koruna_seller.stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_slovak_koruna_seller.stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_slovak_koruna_seller.stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_slovak_koruna_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_slovak_koruna_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

            is_player = yes

    }

        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_slovak_koruna_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_slovak_koruna_to_gold
    }

    }

                limit = {

                    is_capital = yes

                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_slovak_koruna_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes

                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_slovak_koruna_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_1_selle_in_gold

                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_slovak_koruna_seller.stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_slovak_koruna_seller.stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_slovak_koruna_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_slovak_koruna_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_estonian_kroon = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_estonian_kroon_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_estonian_kroon_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_estonian_kroon_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_estonian_kroon_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_estonian_kroon_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_estonian_kroon_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_estonian_kroon_seller.stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_estonian_kroon_seller.stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_estonian_kroon_seller.stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_estonian_kroon_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_estonian_kroon_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_estonian_kroon = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_estonian_kroon_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_estonian_kroon_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_estonian_kroon_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_estonian_kroon_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_estonian_kroon_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_estonian_kroon_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_estonian_kroon_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_estonian_kroon_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_estonian_kroon_seller.stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_estonian_kroon_seller.stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_estonian_kroon_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_estonian_kroon_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#latvian_lats
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_latvian_lats = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_latvian_lats_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_latvian_lats_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_latvian_lats_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_latvian_lats_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_latvian_lats_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_latvian_lats_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_latvian_lats_seller.stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_latvian_lats_seller.stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_latvian_lats_seller.stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_latvian_lats_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_latvian_lats_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_latvian_lats = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_latvian_lats_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_latvian_lats_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_latvian_lats_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_latvian_lats_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_latvian_lats_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_latvian_lats_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_latvian_lats_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_latvian_lats_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_latvian_lats_seller.stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_latvian_lats_seller.stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_latvian_lats_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_latvian_lats_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#lithuanian_litas
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_lithuanian_litas = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_lithuanian_litas_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_lithuanian_litas_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_lithuanian_litas_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_lithuanian_litas_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_lithuanian_litas_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_lithuanian_litas_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_lithuanian_litas_seller.stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_lithuanian_litas_seller.stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_lithuanian_litas_seller.stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_lithuanian_litas_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_lithuanian_litas_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_lithuanian_litas_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes

                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_lithuanian_litas_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_1_selle_in_gold

                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_lithuanian_litas_seller.stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_lithuanian_litas_seller.stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_sell_vriablity > 1

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_lithuanian_litas_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_lithuanian_litas_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_zloti = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_zloti_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_zloti_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_zloti_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_zloti_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_zloti_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_zloti_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_zloti_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_zloti_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_zloti_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_zloti_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_zloti_seller.stockpiling_zloti_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_zloti_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_zloti_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_zloti_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_zloti_seller.stockpiling_zloti_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_zloti_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_zloti_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_zloti_seller.stockpiling_zloti_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_zloti_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_zloti_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_zloti_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_zloti_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

        limit  = {
            is_player = yes

                        add = scope:gold_to_zloti_seller.stockpiling_zloti_state_sell_vriablity
                    }

            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_zloti_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_zloti_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_zloti_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_zloti_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    root = {

    scope:gold_to_drachma_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {

                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_drachma_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_drachma_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_drachma_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_drachma_seller.stockpiling_drachma_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_drachma_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_drachma_seller.stockpiling_drachma_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_drachma_seller.stockpiling_drachma_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_drachma_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_drachma_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_drachma_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_drachma = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_drachma_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_drachma_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_drachma_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_drachma_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_drachma_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_drachma_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_drachma_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_drachma_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_drachma_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_drachma_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_drachma_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_drachma_seller.stockpiling_drachma_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_drachma_seller.stockpiling_drachma_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_drachma_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_drachma_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_drachma_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#peso
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_peso = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_peso_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_peso_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_peso_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_peso_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_peso_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_peso_seller.stockpiling_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_peso_seller.stockpiling_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_peso_seller.stockpiling_peso_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_peso_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_peso_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_peso_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_peso = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_peso_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_peso_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_peso_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_peso_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_peso_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_peso_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_peso_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_peso_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_peso_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_peso_seller.stockpiling_peso_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_peso_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_peso_seller.stockpiling_peso_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_peso_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_peso_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_peso_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_mexican_peso = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_mexican_peso_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_mexican_peso_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_mexican_peso_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_mexican_peso_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_mexican_peso_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_mexican_peso_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_mexican_peso_seller.stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_mexican_peso_seller.stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_mexican_peso_seller.stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_mexican_peso_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_mexican_peso_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

                limit = {

                    is_capital = yes

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }

    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_philippine_peso_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_philippine_peso_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_philippine_peso_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_philippine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted

                    name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_philippine_peso_state_buy_vriablity

            every_scope_state = {

                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

                        name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_philippine_peso_seller.stockpiling_philippine_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_philippine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold

                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast

                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_philippine_peso_buy_message

            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }

                scope:is_player_for_notification = {

                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
