ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_argentine_peso = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_argentine_peso_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_argentine_peso_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_argentine_peso_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_argentine_peso_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_argentine_peso_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_argentine_peso_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_argentine_peso_seller.stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_argentine_peso_seller.stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_argentine_peso_seller.stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_argentine_peso_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_argentine_peso_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_argentine_peso = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_argentine_peso_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_argentine_peso_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_argentine_peso_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_argentine_peso_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_argentine_peso_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_argentine_peso_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_argentine_peso_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_argentine_peso_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_argentine_peso_seller.stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_argentine_peso_seller.stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_argentine_peso_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_argentine_peso_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#chilean_peso
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_chilean_peso = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_chilean_peso_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_chilean_peso_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_chilean_peso_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_chilean_peso_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_chilean_peso_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_chilean_peso_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_chilean_peso_seller.stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_chilean_peso_seller.stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_chilean_peso_seller.stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_chilean_peso_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_chilean_peso_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_chilean_peso = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_chilean_peso_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_chilean_peso_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_chilean_peso_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_chilean_peso_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_chilean_peso_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_chilean_peso_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_chilean_peso_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_chilean_peso_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_chilean_peso_seller.stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_chilean_peso_seller.stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_chilean_peso_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_chilean_peso_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#colombian_peso
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_colombian_peso = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_colombian_peso_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_colombian_peso_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_colombian_peso_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_colombian_peso_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_colombian_peso_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_colombian_peso_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_colombian_peso_seller.stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_colombian_peso_seller.stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_colombian_peso_seller.stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_colombian_peso_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_colombian_peso_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_colombian_peso = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_colombian_peso_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_colombian_peso_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_colombian_peso_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_colombian_peso_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_colombian_peso_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_colombian_peso_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_colombian_peso_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_colombian_peso_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_colombian_peso_seller.stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_colombian_peso_seller.stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_colombian_peso_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_colombian_peso_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#cuban_peso
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_cuban_peso = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_cuban_peso_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_cuban_peso_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_cuban_peso_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_cuban_peso_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_cuban_peso_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_cuban_peso_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_cuban_peso_seller.stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_cuban_peso_seller.stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_cuban_peso_seller.stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_cuban_peso_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_cuban_peso_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_cuban_peso = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_cuban_peso_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_cuban_peso_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_cuban_peso_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_cuban_peso_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_cuban_peso_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_cuban_peso_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_cuban_peso_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_cuban_peso_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_cuban_peso_seller.stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_cuban_peso_seller.stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_cuban_peso_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_cuban_peso_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#dominican_peso
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_dominican_peso = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_dominican_peso_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_dominican_peso_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_dominican_peso_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_dominican_peso_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_dominican_peso_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_dominican_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_dominican_peso_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_dominican_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_dominican_peso_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_dominican_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_dominican_peso_seller.stockpiling_dominican_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_dominican_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_dominican_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_dominican_peso_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_dominican_peso_seller.stockpiling_dominican_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_dominican_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_dominican_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_dominican_peso_seller.stockpiling_dominican_peso_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_dominican_peso_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_dominican_peso_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_dominican_peso_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_dominican_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_dominican_peso = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_dominican_peso_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_dominican_peso_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_dominican_peso_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_dominican_peso_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_dominican_peso_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_dominican_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_dominican_peso_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_dominican_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_dominican_peso_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_dominican_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_dominican_peso_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_dominican_peso_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_dominican_peso_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_dominican_peso_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_dominican_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_dominican_peso_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_dominican_peso_seller.stockpiling_dominican_peso_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_dominican_peso_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_dominican_peso_seller.stockpiling_dominican_peso_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_dominican_peso_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_dominican_peso_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_dominican_peso_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_dominican_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#uruguayan_peso
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_uruguayan_peso = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_uruguayan_peso_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_uruguayan_peso_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_uruguayan_peso_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_uruguayan_peso_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_uruguayan_peso_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_uruguayan_peso_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_uruguayan_peso_seller.stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_uruguayan_peso_seller.stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_uruguayan_peso_seller.stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_uruguayan_peso_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_uruguayan_peso_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_uruguayan_peso = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_uruguayan_peso_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_uruguayan_peso_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_uruguayan_peso_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_uruguayan_peso_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_uruguayan_peso_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_uruguayan_peso_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_uruguayan_peso_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_uruguayan_peso_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_uruguayan_peso_seller.stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_uruguayan_peso_seller.stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_uruguayan_peso_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_uruguayan_peso_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#costa_rican_colón
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_costa_rican_colón = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_costa_rican_colón_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_costa_rican_colón_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_costa_rican_colón_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_costa_rican_colón_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_costa_rican_colón_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_costa_rican_colón_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes

                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_costa_rican_colón_seller.stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_costa_rican_colón_seller.stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_costa_rican_colón_seller.stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_costa_rican_colón_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_costa_rican_colón_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_costa_rican_colón_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes

                        subtract = scope:gold_to_costa_rican_colón_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state_1_selle_in_gold

                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_costa_rican_colón_seller.stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_costa_rican_colón_seller.stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_costa_rican_colón_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_costa_rican_colón_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

        limit  = {
            is_player = yes

    }

        save_scope_as = gold_to_el_salvador_colón_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_el_salvador_colón_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes

                change_variable = {

                }

                    name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_1

            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_el_salvador_colón_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {

                        is_capital = yes
