                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_el_salvador_colón_seller.stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_el_salvador_colón_seller.stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_el_salvador_colón_seller.stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_el_salvador_colón_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_el_salvador_colón_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_el_salvador_colón = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_el_salvador_colón_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_el_salvador_colón_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_el_salvador_colón_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_el_salvador_colón_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_el_salvador_colón_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_el_salvador_colón_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_el_salvador_colón_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_el_salvador_colón_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_el_salvador_colón_seller.stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_el_salvador_colón_seller.stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_el_salvador_colón_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_el_salvador_colón_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#honduran_lempira
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_honduran_lempira = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_honduran_lempira_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_honduran_lempira_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_honduran_lempira_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_honduran_lempira_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_honduran_lempira_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_honduran_lempira_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_honduran_lempira_seller.stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_honduran_lempira_seller.stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_honduran_lempira_seller.stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_honduran_lempira_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_honduran_lempira_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_honduran_lempira = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_honduran_lempira_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_honduran_lempira_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_honduran_lempira_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_honduran_lempira_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_honduran_lempira_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_honduran_lempira_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_honduran_lempira_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_honduran_lempira_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_honduran_lempira_seller.stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_honduran_lempira_seller.stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_honduran_lempira_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_honduran_lempira_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#nicaraguan_córdoba
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_nicaraguan_córdoba = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_nicaraguan_córdoba_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_nicaraguan_córdoba_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_nicaraguan_córdoba_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_nicaraguan_córdoba_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_nicaraguan_córdoba_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_nicaraguan_córdoba_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_nicaraguan_córdoba_seller.stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_nicaraguan_córdoba_seller.stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_nicaraguan_córdoba_seller.stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_nicaraguan_córdoba_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_nicaraguan_córdoba_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_nicaraguan_córdoba = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_nicaraguan_córdoba_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_nicaraguan_córdoba_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_nicaraguan_córdoba_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_nicaraguan_córdoba_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_nicaraguan_córdoba_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_nicaraguan_córdoba_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_nicaraguan_córdoba_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_nicaraguan_córdoba_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_nicaraguan_córdoba_seller.stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_nicaraguan_córdoba_seller.stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_nicaraguan_córdoba_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_nicaraguan_córdoba_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#guatemalan_quetzal
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_guatemalan_quetzal = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_guatemalan_quetzal_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_guatemalan_quetzal_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_guatemalan_quetzal_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_guatemalan_quetzal_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_guatemalan_quetzal_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_guatemalan_quetzal_seller.stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_guatemalan_quetzal_seller.stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_guatemalan_quetzal_seller.stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_guatemalan_quetzal_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_guatemalan_quetzal_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_guatemalan_quetzal = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_guatemalan_quetzal_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_guatemalan_quetzal_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_guatemalan_quetzal_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_guatemalan_quetzal_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_guatemalan_quetzal_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_guatemalan_quetzal_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_guatemalan_quetzal_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_guatemalan_quetzal_seller.stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_guatemalan_quetzal_seller.stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_guatemalan_quetzal_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_guatemalan_quetzal_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#rupee
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_rupee = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_rupee_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_rupee_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_rupee_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_rupee_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_rupee_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_rupee_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_rupee_seller.stockpiling_rupee_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_rupee_seller.stockpiling_rupee_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_rupee_seller.stockpiling_rupee_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_rupee_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_rupee_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_rupee_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_rupee = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_rupee_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_rupee_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_rupee_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_rupee_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_rupee_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_rupee_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_rupee_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_rupee_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_rupee_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_rupee_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_rupee_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_rupee_seller.stockpiling_rupee_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_rupee_seller.stockpiling_rupee_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_rupee_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_rupee_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_rupee_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#pakistan_rupee
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_pakistan_rupee = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_pakistan_rupee_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_pakistan_rupee_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_pakistan_rupee_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_pakistan_rupee_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_pakistan_rupee_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_pakistan_rupee_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_pakistan_rupee_seller.stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_pakistan_rupee_seller.stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_pakistan_rupee_seller.stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_pakistan_rupee_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_pakistan_rupee_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

                }
            }

                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes

                        subtract = scope:gold_to_pakistan_rupee_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state_1_selle_in_gold

                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_pakistan_rupee_seller.stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state_sell_vriablity

                }

            if = {

                    stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state_sell_vriablity > 1

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_pakistan_rupee_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_pakistan_rupee_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_nepalese_rupee = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_nepalese_rupee_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_nepalese_rupee_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_nepalese_rupee_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_nepalese_rupee_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_nepalese_rupee_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_nepalese_rupee_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_nepalese_rupee_seller.stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_nepalese_rupee_seller.stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_nepalese_rupee_seller.stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_nepalese_rupee_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_nepalese_rupee_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_nepalese_rupee_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_nepalese_rupee_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_nepalese_rupee_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_nepalese_rupee_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {

                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes

                }
            }

            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes

                        name = stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_state_1

                    }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast

            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_nepalese_rupee_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_nepalese_rupee_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

        limit  = {

            has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
        }

    }

                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_yen_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
        }

    }

    root = {

    }

    scope:gold_to_yen_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes

                set_variable = {

                }

                    add = var:stockpiling_yen_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_yen_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_yen_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_yen_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_yen_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_yen_seller.stockpiling_yen_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_yen_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_yen_seller.stockpiling_yen_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_yen_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_yen_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_yen_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_yen_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#peseta
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_peseta = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_peseta_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_peseta_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_peseta_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_peseta_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_peseta_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_peseta_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_peseta_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_peseta_seller.stockpiling_peseta_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_peseta_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_peseta_seller.stockpiling_peseta_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_peseta_seller.stockpiling_peseta_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_peseta_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_peseta_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_peseta_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_peseta = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_peseta_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_peseta_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_peseta_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_peseta_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_peseta_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_peseta_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_peseta_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_peseta_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_peseta_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_peseta_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_peseta_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_peseta_seller.stockpiling_peseta_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_peseta_seller.stockpiling_peseta_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_peseta_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_peseta_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_peseta_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#ruble
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_ruble = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_ruble_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_ruble_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_ruble_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_ruble_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_ruble_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_ruble_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_ruble_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_ruble_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_ruble_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_ruble_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_ruble_seller.stockpiling_ruble_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_ruble_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_ruble_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_ruble_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_ruble_seller.stockpiling_ruble_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_ruble_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_ruble_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_ruble_seller.stockpiling_ruble_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_ruble_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ruble_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ruble_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_ruble_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_lev_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_lev_seller.stockpiling_lev_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_lev_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_lev_seller.stockpiling_lev_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_lev_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_lev_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_lev_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_lev_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#hungarian_forint
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_hungarian_forint = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_hungarian_forint_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_hungarian_forint_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_hungarian_forint_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_hungarian_forint_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_hungarian_forint_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_hungarian_forint_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_hungarian_forint_seller.stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_hungarian_forint_seller.stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_hungarian_forint_seller.stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_hungarian_forint_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_hungarian_forint_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_hungarian_forint = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_hungarian_forint_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_hungarian_forint_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_hungarian_forint_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_hungarian_forint_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_hungarian_forint_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_hungarian_forint_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_hungarian_forint_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_hungarian_forint_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_hungarian_forint_seller.stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_hungarian_forint_seller.stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_hungarian_forint_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_hungarian_forint_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#dinar
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_dinar = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_dinar_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_dinar_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_dinar_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_dinar_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_dinar_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_dinar_seller.stockpiling_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_dinar_seller.stockpiling_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_dinar_seller.stockpiling_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_dinar_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_dinar_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_dinar_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_dinar = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_dinar_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_dinar_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_dinar_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_dinar_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_dinar_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_dinar_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_dinar_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_dinar_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_dinar_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_dinar_seller.stockpiling_dinar_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_dinar_seller.stockpiling_dinar_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_dinar_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_dinar_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_dinar_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

            has_law = law_type:law_algerian_dinar_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_algerian_dinar_to_gold
    }

        save_scope_as = gold_to_algerian_dinar_seller

                    is_capital = yes

                    change_variable = {

                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold

                        subtract = scope:gold_to_algerian_dinar_seller.stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity

                scope:is_player_for_notification = {

            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }

                limit = {

                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold

                }
            }

                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {

                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_bahraini_dinar_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_bahraini_dinar_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_bahraini_dinar_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_bahraini_dinar_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
