                save_scope_as = gold_to_bahraini_dinar_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_bahraini_dinar_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_bahraini_dinar_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_bahraini_dinar_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_bahraini_dinar_seller.stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_bahraini_dinar_seller.stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_bahraini_dinar_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_bahraini_dinar_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#iraqi_dinar
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_iraqi_dinar = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_iraqi_dinar_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_iraqi_dinar_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_iraqi_dinar_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_iraqi_dinar_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_iraqi_dinar_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_iraqi_dinar_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_iraqi_dinar_seller.stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_iraqi_dinar_seller.stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_iraqi_dinar_seller.stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_iraqi_dinar_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_iraqi_dinar_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_iraqi_dinar = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_iraqi_dinar_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_iraqi_dinar_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_iraqi_dinar_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_iraqi_dinar_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_iraqi_dinar_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_iraqi_dinar_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_iraqi_dinar_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_iraqi_dinar_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_iraqi_dinar_seller.stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_iraqi_dinar_seller.stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_iraqi_dinar_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_iraqi_dinar_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#jordanian_dinar
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_jordanian_dinar = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_jordanian_dinar_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_jordanian_dinar_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_jordanian_dinar_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_jordanian_dinar_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_jordanian_dinar_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_jordanian_dinar_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_jordanian_dinar_seller.stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_jordanian_dinar_seller.stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_jordanian_dinar_seller.stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_jordanian_dinar_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_jordanian_dinar_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_jordanian_dinar_currency
        }

    }

        save_scope_as = gold_to_jordanian_dinar_seller
    }

        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes

                save_scope_as = gold_to_jordanian_dinar_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_sell_vriablity

                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_jordanian_dinar_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_jordanian_dinar_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_jordanian_dinar_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_jordanian_dinar_seller.stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_jordanian_dinar_seller.stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_jordanian_dinar_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_jordanian_dinar_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_libyan_dinar_currency

    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_libyan_dinar_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_libyan_dinar_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_libyan_dinar_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {

                    }
                    change_variable = {

                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation

                    change_variable = {

                    #########

                        subtract = scope:gold_to_libyan_dinar_seller.stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state_buy_vriablity

                    #########

                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_libyan_dinar_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_libyan_dinar_currency
        }

    }

        save_scope_as = gold_to_libyan_dinar_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_libyan_dinar_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {

                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes

                set_variable = {

                    name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_libyan_dinar_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation

                change_variable = {

                    add = var:stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold

                #########

                    name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_libyan_dinar_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_libyan_dinar_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_libyan_dinar_seller.stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_libyan_dinar_seller.stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_libyan_dinar_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_libyan_dinar_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_serbian_dinar_seller.stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_serbian_dinar_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_serbian_dinar_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_serbian_dinar = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_serbian_dinar_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_serbian_dinar_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_serbian_dinar_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_serbian_dinar_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_serbian_dinar_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_serbian_dinar_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_serbian_dinar_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_serbian_dinar_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_serbian_dinar_seller.stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_serbian_dinar_seller.stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_serbian_dinar_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_serbian_dinar_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#tunisian_dinar
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_tunisian_dinar = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_tunisian_dinar_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_tunisian_dinar_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_tunisian_dinar_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_tunisian_dinar_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_tunisian_dinar_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_tunisian_dinar_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_tunisian_dinar_seller.stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_tunisian_dinar_seller.stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_tunisian_dinar_seller.stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_tunisian_dinar_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_tunisian_dinar_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_tunisian_dinar = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_tunisian_dinar_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_tunisian_dinar_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_tunisian_dinar_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_tunisian_dinar_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_tunisian_dinar_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_tunisian_dinar_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_tunisian_dinar_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_tunisian_dinar_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_tunisian_dinar_seller.stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_tunisian_dinar_seller.stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_tunisian_dinar_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_tunisian_dinar_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#yugoslav_dinar
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_yugoslav_dinar = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_yugoslav_dinar_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_yugoslav_dinar_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_yugoslav_dinar_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_yugoslav_dinar_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_yugoslav_dinar_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_yugoslav_dinar_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_yugoslav_dinar_seller.stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_yugoslav_dinar_seller.stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_yugoslav_dinar_seller.stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_yugoslav_dinar_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_yugoslav_dinar_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

            is_player = yes

                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_yugoslav_dinar_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes

                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_yugoslav_dinar_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold

                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_yugoslav_dinar_seller.stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_yugoslav_dinar_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_yugoslav_dinar_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_tuareg_ouguiya_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_tuareg_ouguiya_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_tuareg_ouguiya_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_tuareg_ouguiya_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }

                        value =  scope:gold_to_tuareg_ouguiya_seller.stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buy_vriablity

                    change_variable = {

                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation

                    }

                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {

                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_tuareg_ouguiya_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }

                        name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1

                    stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state_sell_vriablity > 1

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_tuareg_ouguiya_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_tuareg_ouguiya_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#moroccan_dirham
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_moroccan_dirham = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_moroccan_dirham_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_moroccan_dirham_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_moroccan_dirham_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_moroccan_dirham_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_moroccan_dirham_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_moroccan_dirham_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_moroccan_dirham_seller.stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_moroccan_dirham_seller.stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_moroccan_dirham_seller.stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_moroccan_dirham_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_moroccan_dirham_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_moroccan_dirham = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_moroccan_dirham_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_moroccan_dirham_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_moroccan_dirham_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_moroccan_dirham_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_moroccan_dirham_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_moroccan_dirham_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_moroccan_dirham_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_moroccan_dirham_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_moroccan_dirham_seller.stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_moroccan_dirham_seller.stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_moroccan_dirham_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_moroccan_dirham_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#omanian_rial
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_omanian_rial = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_omanian_rial_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_omanian_rial_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_omanian_rial_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_omanian_rial_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_omanian_rial_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_omanian_rial_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_omanian_rial_seller.stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_omanian_rial_seller.stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_omanian_rial_seller.stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_omanian_rial_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_omanian_rial_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_omanian_rial = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_omanian_rial_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_omanian_rial_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_omanian_rial_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_omanian_rial_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_omanian_rial_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_omanian_rial_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_omanian_rial_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_omanian_rial_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_omanian_rial_seller.stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_omanian_rial_seller.stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_omanian_rial_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_omanian_rial_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_qatari_riyal_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_qatari_riyal_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_qatari_riyal_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_qatari_riyal_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_qatari_riyal_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_qatari_riyal_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_qatari_riyal_seller.stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_qatari_riyal_seller.stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_qatari_riyal_seller.stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_qatari_riyal_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_qatari_riyal_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_qatari_riyal_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_qatari_riyal_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_qatari_riyal_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_qatari_riyal_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes

                    add = var:stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_1_selle_in_gold

                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_qatari_riyal_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes

                    change_variable = {

                        subtract = scope:gold_to_qatari_riyal_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_1_selle_in_gold

                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_1

                    }
                }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_qatari_riyal_seller.stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_sell_vriablity > 1

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_qatari_riyal_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_qatari_riyal_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }

    }

        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_saudi_riyal_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_saudi_riyal_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_saudi_riyal_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_saudi_riyal_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_saudi_riyal_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_saudi_riyal_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes

                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_saudi_riyal_seller.stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_saudi_riyal_seller.stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_saudi_riyal_seller.stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_buy_vriablity

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_saudi_riyal_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_saudi_riyal_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_saudi_riyal = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_saudi_riyal_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_saudi_riyal_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_saudi_riyal_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_saudi_riyal_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {

                    is_capital = yes

                save_scope_as = gold_to_saudi_riyal_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_sell_vriablity

                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_saudi_riyal_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
