                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_saudi_riyal_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_saudi_riyal_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_saudi_riyal_seller.stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_saudi_riyal_seller.stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_saudi_riyal_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_saudi_riyal_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#yuan
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_yuan = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_yuan_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_yuan_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_yuan_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_yuan_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_yuan_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_yuan_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_yuan_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_yuan_seller.stockpiling_yuan_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_yuan_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_yuan_seller.stockpiling_yuan_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_yuan_seller.stockpiling_yuan_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_yuan_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_yuan_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_yuan_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_yuan = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_yuan_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_yuan_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_yuan_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_yuan_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_yuan_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_yuan_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_yuan_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_yuan_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_yuan_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_yuan_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_yuan_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_yuan_seller.stockpiling_yuan_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_yuan_seller.stockpiling_yuan_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_yuan_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_yuan_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_yuan_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#korean_won
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_korean_won = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_korean_won_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_korean_won_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_korean_won_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_korean_won_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_korean_won_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_korean_won_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_korean_won_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_korean_won_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_korean_won_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_korean_won_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_korean_won_seller.stockpiling_korean_won_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_korean_won_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_korean_won_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_korean_won_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_korean_won_seller.stockpiling_korean_won_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_korean_won_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_korean_won_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_korean_won_seller.stockpiling_korean_won_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_korean_won_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_korean_won_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_korean_won_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_korean_won_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_baht_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }

        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_tical_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_tical_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_tical_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_tical_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_tical_seller.stockpiling_tical_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_tical_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_tical_seller.stockpiling_tical_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_tical_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_tical_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_tical_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_tical_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#qiran
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_qiran = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_qiran_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_qiran_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_qiran_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_qiran_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_qiran_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_qiran_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_qiran_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_qiran_seller.stockpiling_qiran_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_qiran_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_qiran_seller.stockpiling_qiran_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_qiran_seller.stockpiling_qiran_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_qiran_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_qiran_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_qiran_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_qiran = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_qiran_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_qiran_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_qiran_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_qiran_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_qiran_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_qiran_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_qiran_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_qiran_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_qiran_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_qiran_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_qiran_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_qiran_seller.stockpiling_qiran_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_qiran_seller.stockpiling_qiran_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_qiran_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_qiran_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_qiran_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#south_african_rand
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_south_african_rand = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_south_african_rand_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_south_african_rand_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_south_african_rand_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_south_african_rand_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_south_african_rand_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_south_african_rand_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_south_african_rand_seller.stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_south_african_rand_seller.stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_south_african_rand_seller.stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_south_african_rand_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_south_african_rand_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_south_african_rand_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_south_african_rand_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_south_african_rand_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_south_african_rand_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_south_african_rand_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_south_african_rand_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_south_african_rand_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_south_african_rand_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_south_african_rand_seller.stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_south_african_rand_seller.stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_south_african_rand_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_south_african_rand_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#nigerian_naira
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_nigerian_naira = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_nigerian_naira_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_nigerian_naira_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_nigerian_naira_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_nigerian_naira_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_nigerian_naira_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_nigerian_naira_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_nigerian_naira_seller.stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_nigerian_naira_seller.stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_nigerian_naira_seller.stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_nigerian_naira_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_nigerian_naira_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

            }

                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes

                        name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_1

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_nigerian_naira_seller.stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_nigerian_naira_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_nigerian_naira_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }

        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_ghanaian_cedi_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_ghanaian_cedi_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_ghanaian_cedi_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_ghanaian_cedi_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_ghanaian_cedi_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_ghanaian_cedi_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_ghanaian_cedi_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_ghanaian_cedi_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_ghanaian_cedi_seller.stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_ghanaian_cedi_seller.stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ghanaian_cedi_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ghanaian_cedi_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#sierra_leonean_leone
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_sierra_leonean_leone = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_sierra_leonean_leone_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_sierra_leonean_leone_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_sierra_leonean_leone_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_sierra_leonean_leone_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_sierra_leonean_leone_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_sierra_leonean_leone_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_sierra_leonean_leone_seller.stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_sierra_leonean_leone_seller.stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_sierra_leonean_leone_seller.stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_sierra_leonean_leone_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_sierra_leonean_leone_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_sierra_leonean_leone = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_sierra_leonean_leone_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_sierra_leonean_leone_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_sierra_leonean_leone_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_sierra_leonean_leone_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_sierra_leonean_leone_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_sierra_leonean_leone_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_sierra_leonean_leone_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_sierra_leonean_leone_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_sierra_leonean_leone_seller.stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_sierra_leonean_leone_seller.stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_sierra_leonean_leone_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_sierra_leonean_leone_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#west_african_eco
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_west_african_eco = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_west_african_eco_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_west_african_eco_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_west_african_eco_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_west_african_eco_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_west_african_eco_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_west_african_eco_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_west_african_eco_seller.stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_west_african_eco_seller.stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_west_african_eco_seller.stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_west_african_eco_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_west_african_eco_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_west_african_eco = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_west_african_eco_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_west_african_eco_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_west_african_eco_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_west_african_eco_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_west_african_eco_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_west_african_eco_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_west_african_eco_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_west_african_eco_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_west_african_eco_seller.stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_west_african_eco_seller.stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_west_african_eco_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_west_african_eco_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#central_african_eco
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_central_african_eco = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_central_african_eco_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_central_african_eco_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_central_african_eco_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_central_african_eco_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_central_african_eco_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_central_african_eco_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_central_african_eco_seller.stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_central_african_eco_seller.stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_central_african_eco_seller.stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_central_african_eco_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_central_african_eco_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_central_african_eco = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_central_african_eco_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_central_african_eco_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_central_african_eco_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_central_african_eco_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes

                save_scope_as = gold_to_central_african_eco_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_central_african_eco_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_central_african_eco_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_central_african_eco_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_central_african_eco_seller.stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_central_african_eco_seller.stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_central_african_eco_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_central_african_eco_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#east_african_eco
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_east_african_eco = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_east_african_eco_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_east_african_eco_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_east_african_eco_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_east_african_eco_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_east_african_eco_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_east_african_eco_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_east_african_eco_seller.stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_east_african_eco_seller.stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_east_african_eco_seller.stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_east_african_eco_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_east_african_eco_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_east_african_eco = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_east_african_eco_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_east_african_eco_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_east_african_eco_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_east_african_eco_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_east_african_eco_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_east_african_eco_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_east_african_eco_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_east_african_eco_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_east_african_eco_seller.stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_east_african_eco_seller.stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_east_african_eco_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_east_african_eco_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#ethiopian_birr
ai_buy_global_monetary_reference_1_ethiopian_birr = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_ethiopian_birr_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_ethiopian_birr_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_ethiopian_birr_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_ethiopian_birr_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_ethiopian_birr_seller_capital_state

                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    subtract = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1_buy_in_gold_scripted
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1
                    add = owner.stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_buy_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_ethiopian_birr_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value =  scope:gold_to_ethiopian_birr_seller.stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_buy_vriablity
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        add = var:stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    }

                    #########
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_ethiopian_birr_seller.stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_buy_vriablity
                    }

                    #########
                    #Reset
                    set_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1_buy_in_gold
                        value = 0
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1_buy_in_gold_for_toast
                value = scope:gold_to_ethiopian_birr_seller.stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_buy_vriablity
            }
            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_buy_vriablity > 1
                }
                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ethiopian_birr_buy_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ethiopian_birr_buy_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
ai_sell_global_monetary_reference_1_ethiopian_birr = {

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            is_player = yes
        }
        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
    }

    every_country = {
        limit  = {
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            has_law = law_type:law_ethiopian_birr_currency
        }
        save_scope_as = global_monetary_reference_ethiopian_birr_to_gold
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = gold_to_ethiopian_birr_seller
    }

    scope:gold_to_ethiopian_birr_seller = {
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                save_scope_as = gold_to_ethiopian_birr_seller_capital_state

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = owner.stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_sell_vriablity
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    multiply = scope:global_monetary_reference_ethiopian_birr_to_gold.money_value_rapported_inflation
                }
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = var:stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1_selle_in_gold
                }

                #########
                change_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1
                    subtract = owner.stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_sell_vriablity
                }
            }
        }
        scope:global_monetary_reference_ethiopian_birr_to_gold = {
            every_scope_state = {
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                        is_capital = yes
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                        subtract = scope:gold_to_ethiopian_birr_seller_capital_state.var:stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    }
                    change_variable = {
                        name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1
                        add = scope:gold_to_ethiopian_birr_seller.stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_sell_vriablity
                    }
                }
            }

            set_variable = {
                name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1_sell_in_gold_for_toast
                value =  scope:gold_to_ethiopian_birr_seller.stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_sell_vriablity
            }

            if = {
                limit = {
                    stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_sell_vriablity > 1
                }

                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ethiopian_birr_sell_message
                scope:is_player_for_notification = {
                    post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ethiopian_birr_sell_message
                }
            }
        }
        every_scope_state = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                    is_capital = yes
                }
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1_selle_in_gold
                    value = 0
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

# ██╔═══██╗██║   ██║██╔════╝██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══██╗╚══██╔══╝██╔════╝██╔══██╗
