#money
buy_undervalued_money_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = money_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #money
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = money_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_money_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:money_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_money_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:money_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_money_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_money_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_money_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_money_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_money_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_money_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_money_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_money_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_money_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_money_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = money_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_money_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #money
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = money_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_money_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_money_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:money_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_money_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:money_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_money_state > var:money_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_money_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_money_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_money_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_money_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_money_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_money_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_money_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#dollar
buy_undervalued_dollar_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = dollar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #dollar
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = dollar_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:dollar_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:dollar_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_dollar_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_dollar_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = dollar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_dollar_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #dollar
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = dollar_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_dollar_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:dollar_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:dollar_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_dollar_state > var:dollar_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#australian_dollar
buy_undervalued_australian_dollar_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = australian_dollar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_australian_dollar_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #australian_dollar
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_australian_dollar_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = australian_dollar_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_australian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:australian_dollar_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_australian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:australian_dollar_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_australian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_australian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_australian_dollar_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_australian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_australian_dollar_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_australian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_australian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_australian_dollar_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_australian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = australian_dollar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_australian_dollar_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_australian_dollar_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #australian_dollar
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_australian_dollar_currency

                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = australian_dollar_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_australian_dollar_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_australian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:australian_dollar_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_australian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:australian_dollar_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_australian_dollar_state > var:australian_dollar_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_australian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_australian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_australian_dollar_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_australian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_australian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_australian_dollar_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_australian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#canadian_dollar
buy_undervalued_canadian_dollar_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = canadian_dollar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_canadian_dollar_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #canadian_dollar
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_canadian_dollar_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = canadian_dollar_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_canadian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:canadian_dollar_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_canadian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:canadian_dollar_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_canadian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_canadian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_canadian_dollar_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_canadian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_canadian_dollar_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_canadian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_canadian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_canadian_dollar_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_canadian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes

                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1

                                }
                                #########

                                    name = stockpiling_canadian_dollar_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_canadian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity

                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = new_zealand_dollar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_new_zealand_dollar_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #new_zealand_dollar
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_new_zealand_dollar_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = new_zealand_dollar_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_new_zealand_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:new_zealand_dollar_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }

                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_new_zealand_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:new_zealand_dollar_quantity_var

                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_new_zealand_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_new_zealand_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_new_zealand_dollar_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }

                            limit = {

                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########

                        }

                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_new_zealand_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_new_zealand_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_new_zealand_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:new_zealand_dollar_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_new_zealand_dollar_state > var:new_zealand_dollar_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_new_zealand_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_new_zealand_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_new_zealand_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_new_zealand_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_new_zealand_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#liberian_dollar
buy_undervalued_liberian_dollar_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = liberian_dollar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_liberian_dollar_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #liberian_dollar
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_liberian_dollar_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = liberian_dollar_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_liberian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:liberian_dollar_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_liberian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:liberian_dollar_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_liberian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_liberian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_liberian_dollar_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_liberian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_liberian_dollar_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_liberian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_liberian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_liberian_dollar_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_liberian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_liberian_dollar_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = liberian_dollar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_liberian_dollar_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_liberian_dollar_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #liberian_dollar
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_liberian_dollar_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = liberian_dollar_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_liberian_dollar_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_liberian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:liberian_dollar_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_liberian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:liberian_dollar_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_liberian_dollar_state > var:liberian_dollar_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_liberian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_liberian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_liberian_dollar_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_liberian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_liberian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_liberian_dollar_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_liberian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#caribbean_dollar
buy_undervalued_caribbean_dollar_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = caribbean_dollar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_caribbean_dollar_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #caribbean_dollar
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_caribbean_dollar_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = caribbean_dollar_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_caribbean_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:caribbean_dollar_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_caribbean_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:caribbean_dollar_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_caribbean_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_caribbean_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_caribbean_dollar_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_caribbean_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_caribbean_dollar_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_caribbean_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_caribbean_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_caribbean_dollar_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_caribbean_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

                not = {

                            #########

                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_caribbean_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {

                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes

                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_caribbean_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                    name = stockpiling_caribbean_dollar_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_caribbean_dollar_state_buy_vriablity

                            }
                        }
                    }

            }
        }
    }

buy_undervalued_sterling_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = sterling_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #sterling
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = sterling_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_sterling_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:sterling_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_sterling_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:sterling_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_sterling_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_sterling_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_sterling_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_sterling_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_sterling_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_sterling_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_sterling_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner

                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls

        }

            #sterling

                            }
                        }

                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_sterling_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_sterling_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

buy_undervalued_irish_pound_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

        variable = irish_pound_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1

        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_irish_pound_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #irish_pound
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_irish_pound_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }

                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }

                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:irish_pound_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_irish_pound_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:irish_pound_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_irish_pound_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_irish_pound_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_irish_pound_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_irish_pound_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_irish_pound_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_irish_pound_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_irish_pound_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_irish_pound_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_irish_pound_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_irish_pound_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = irish_pound_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_irish_pound_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_irish_pound_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #irish_pound
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_irish_pound_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = irish_pound_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_irish_pound_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_irish_pound_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:irish_pound_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_irish_pound_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:irish_pound_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_irish_pound_state > var:irish_pound_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_irish_pound_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_irish_pound_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_irish_pound_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_irish_pound_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_irish_pound_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_irish_pound_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_irish_pound_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#egyptian_pound
buy_undervalued_egyptian_pound_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = egyptian_pound_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_egyptian_pound_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #egyptian_pound
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_egyptian_pound_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = egyptian_pound_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_egyptian_pound_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:egyptian_pound_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_egyptian_pound_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:egyptian_pound_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_egyptian_pound_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_egyptian_pound_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_egyptian_pound_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_egyptian_pound_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_egyptian_pound_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_egyptian_pound_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_egyptian_pound_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_egyptian_pound_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_egyptian_pound_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = egyptian_pound_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_egyptian_pound_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_egyptian_pound_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #egyptian_pound
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_egyptian_pound_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = egyptian_pound_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_egyptian_pound_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }
