                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_florin_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_florin_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_florin_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#gulden
buy_undervalued_gulden_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = gulden_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #gulden
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = gulden_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:gulden_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:gulden_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_gulden_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_gulden_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = gulden_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_gulden_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #gulden
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = gulden_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_gulden_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:gulden_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:gulden_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_gulden_state > var:gulden_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#lira
buy_undervalued_lira_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = lira_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #lira
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = lira_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:lira_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_lira_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:lira_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lira_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_lira_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lira_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lira_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_lira_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = lira_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_lira_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #lira
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = lira_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_lira_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:lira_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_lira_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:lira_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_lira_state > var:lira_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_lira_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lira_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#scudo_sardo
buy_undervalued_scudo_sardo_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = scudo_sardo_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_scudo_sardo_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #scudo_sardo
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_scudo_sardo_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = scudo_sardo_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_sardo_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:scudo_sardo_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_sardo_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:scudo_sardo_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_sardo_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_sardo_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_sardo_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_sardo_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_sardo_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_sardo_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_scudo_sardo_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = scudo_sardo_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_scudo_sardo_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #scudo_sardo
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_scudo_sardo_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }

                    name = scudo_sardo_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }

                        value = 1

                        multiply = 0.50

                        value = 1

                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_scudo_sardo_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:scudo_sardo_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state > var:scudo_sardo_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_sardo_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_sardo_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_sardo_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_sardo_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_sardo_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#toscane_lira
buy_undervalued_toscane_lira_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = toscane_lira_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_toscane_lira_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #toscane_lira
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_toscane_lira_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = toscane_lira_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_toscane_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:toscane_lira_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_toscane_lira_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:toscane_lira_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_toscane_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_toscane_lira_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_toscane_lira_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_toscane_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_toscane_lira_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_toscane_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_toscane_lira_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = toscane_lira_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_toscane_lira_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_toscane_lira_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #toscane_lira
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_toscane_lira_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = toscane_lira_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_toscane_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:toscane_lira_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_toscane_lira_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:toscane_lira_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_toscane_lira_state > var:toscane_lira_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_toscane_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_toscane_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_toscane_lira_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_toscane_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_toscane_lira_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#scudo_pontificio
buy_undervalued_scudo_pontificio_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = scudo_pontificio_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_scudo_pontificio_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #scudo_pontificio
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_scudo_pontificio_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = scudo_pontificio_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_pontificio_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:scudo_pontificio_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_pontificio_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:scudo_pontificio_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_pontificio_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_pontificio_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_pontificio_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_pontificio_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_pontificio_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_pontificio_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_scudo_pontificio_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = scudo_pontificio_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_scudo_pontificio_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #scudo_pontificio
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_scudo_pontificio_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = scudo_pontificio_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_scudo_pontificio_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:scudo_pontificio_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_scudo_pontificio_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:scudo_pontificio_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state > var:scudo_pontificio_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_pontificio_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_pontificio_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_pontificio_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_pontificio_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_pontificio_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#ducato
buy_undervalued_ducato_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = ducato_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_ducato_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #ducato
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_ducato_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = ducato_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_ducato_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:ducato_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_ducato_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:ducato_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_ducato_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ducato_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_ducato_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ducato_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_ducato_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ducato_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ducato_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_ducato_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ducato_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_ducato_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = ducato_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_ducato_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_ducato_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #ducato
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_ducato_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = ducato_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_ducato_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_ducato_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:ducato_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_ducato_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:ducato_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_ducato_state > var:ducato_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ducato_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_ducato_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_ducato_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_ducato_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ducato_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_ducato_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ducato_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = ottoman_lira_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #ottoman_lira
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }

                    name = ottoman_lira_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:ottoman_lira_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }

                    value = var:ottoman_lira_quantity_var
                }

                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ottoman_lira_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ottoman_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }

                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ottoman_lira_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ottoman_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ottoman_lira_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_ottoman_lira_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ottoman_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ottoman_lira_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
