#swedish_krona
buy_undervalued_swedish_krona_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = swedish_krona_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_swedish_krona_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #swedish_krona
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_swedish_krona_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = swedish_krona_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_swedish_krona_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:swedish_krona_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_swedish_krona_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:swedish_krona_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_swedish_krona_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_swedish_krona_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_swedish_krona_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_swedish_krona_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_swedish_krona_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_swedish_krona_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_swedish_krona_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_swedish_krona_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = swedish_krona_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_swedish_krona_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_swedish_krona_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #swedish_krona
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_swedish_krona_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = swedish_krona_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_swedish_krona_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:swedish_krona_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_swedish_krona_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:swedish_krona_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_swedish_krona_state > var:swedish_krona_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_swedish_krona_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_swedish_krona_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_swedish_krona_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_swedish_krona_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_swedish_krona_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#norwegian_krone
buy_undervalued_norwegian_krone_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = norwegian_krone_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_norwegian_krone_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #norwegian_krone
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_norwegian_krone_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = norwegian_krone_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_norwegian_krone_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:norwegian_krone_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_norwegian_krone_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:norwegian_krone_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_norwegian_krone_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_norwegian_krone_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_norwegian_krone_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_norwegian_krone_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_norwegian_krone_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_norwegian_krone_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_norwegian_krone_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = norwegian_krone_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_norwegian_krone_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #norwegian_krone
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_norwegian_krone_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = norwegian_krone_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_norwegian_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:norwegian_krone_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_norwegian_krone_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:norwegian_krone_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state > var:norwegian_krone_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_norwegian_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_norwegian_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_norwegian_krone_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_norwegian_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_norwegian_krone_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#danish_krone
buy_undervalued_danish_krone_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = danish_krone_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_danish_krone_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #danish_krone
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_danish_krone_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = danish_krone_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_danish_krone_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:danish_krone_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_danish_krone_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:danish_krone_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_danish_krone_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_danish_krone_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_danish_krone_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_danish_krone_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_danish_krone_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_danish_krone_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_danish_krone_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_danish_krone_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_danish_krone_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = danish_krone_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_danish_krone_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_danish_krone_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #danish_krone
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_danish_krone_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = danish_krone_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_danish_krone_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_danish_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:danish_krone_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }

                    name = stockpiling_overrated_danish_krone_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:danish_krone_quantity_var

                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_danish_krone_state > var:danish_krone_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_danish_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }

                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_danish_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_danish_krone_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_danish_krone_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_danish_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_danish_krone_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_danish_krone_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = czech_koruna_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1

    }

    if = {

            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_czech_koruna_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #czech_koruna
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_czech_koruna_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union

                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }

                        every_scope_state = {

                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_czech_koruna_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_czech_koruna_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = czech_koruna_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_czech_koruna_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_czech_koruna_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #czech_koruna
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_czech_koruna_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = czech_koruna_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_czech_koruna_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_czech_koruna_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:czech_koruna_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_czech_koruna_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:czech_koruna_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_czech_koruna_state > var:czech_koruna_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_czech_koruna_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_czech_koruna_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_czech_koruna_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_czech_koruna_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_czech_koruna_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#icelandic_króna
buy_undervalued_icelandic_króna_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = icelandic_króna_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_icelandic_króna_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #icelandic_króna
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_icelandic_króna_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = icelandic_króna_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_icelandic_króna_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:icelandic_króna_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_icelandic_króna_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:icelandic_króna_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_icelandic_króna_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_icelandic_króna_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_icelandic_króna_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_icelandic_króna_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_icelandic_króna_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_icelandic_króna_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_icelandic_króna_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = icelandic_króna_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_icelandic_króna_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #icelandic_króna
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_icelandic_króna_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = icelandic_króna_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_icelandic_króna_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:icelandic_króna_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_icelandic_króna_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:icelandic_króna_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state > var:icelandic_króna_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_icelandic_króna_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_icelandic_króna_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_icelandic_króna_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_icelandic_króna_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_icelandic_króna_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_icelandic_króna_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#slovak_koruna
buy_undervalued_slovak_koruna_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = slovak_koruna_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_slovak_koruna_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #slovak_koruna
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_slovak_koruna_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = slovak_koruna_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_slovak_koruna_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:slovak_koruna_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_slovak_koruna_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:slovak_koruna_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_slovak_koruna_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_slovak_koruna_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_slovak_koruna_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_slovak_koruna_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_slovak_koruna_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_slovak_koruna_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = slovak_koruna_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_slovak_koruna_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #slovak_koruna
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_slovak_koruna_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }

                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {

                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes

                                #########

                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1

                                    name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_1

                            }

buy_undervalued_estonian_kroon_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = estonian_kroon_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_estonian_kroon_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #estonian_kroon
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_estonian_kroon_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = estonian_kroon_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_estonian_kroon_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:estonian_kroon_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_estonian_kroon_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:estonian_kroon_quantity_var
                }

                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_estonian_kroon_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_estonian_kroon_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_estonian_kroon_state_1_buyer_in_gold

                            #########

                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_estonian_kroon_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_estonian_kroon_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_estonian_kroon_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

                                    is_capital = yes

                                #########

                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1

                                }
                                #########

                                    name = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_estonian_kroon_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }

#latvian_lats
buy_undervalued_latvian_lats_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = latvian_lats_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_latvian_lats_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #latvian_lats
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_latvian_lats_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = latvian_lats_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_latvian_lats_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:latvian_lats_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_latvian_lats_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:latvian_lats_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_latvian_lats_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_latvian_lats_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_latvian_lats_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_latvian_lats_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_latvian_lats_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_latvian_lats_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_latvian_lats_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_latvian_lats_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = latvian_lats_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_latvian_lats_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_latvian_lats_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #latvian_lats
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_latvian_lats_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = latvian_lats_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_latvian_lats_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:latvian_lats_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_latvian_lats_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:latvian_lats_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_latvian_lats_state > var:latvian_lats_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_latvian_lats_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_latvian_lats_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_latvian_lats_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_latvian_lats_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_latvian_lats_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#lithuanian_litas
buy_undervalued_lithuanian_litas_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = lithuanian_litas_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_lithuanian_litas_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #lithuanian_litas
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_lithuanian_litas_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = lithuanian_litas_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_lithuanian_litas_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:lithuanian_litas_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_lithuanian_litas_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:lithuanian_litas_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_lithuanian_litas_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lithuanian_litas_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lithuanian_litas_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lithuanian_litas_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lithuanian_litas_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lithuanian_litas_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = lithuanian_litas_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_lithuanian_litas_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #lithuanian_litas
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_lithuanian_litas_currency

                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }

                        multiply = 0.50

                        value = 1

                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_lithuanian_litas_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########

                                name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_lithuanian_litas_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lithuanian_litas_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lithuanian_litas_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

#zloti
buy_undervalued_zloti_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = zloti_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_zloti_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #zloti
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_zloti_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = zloti_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_zloti_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:zloti_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_zloti_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:zloti_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_zloti_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_zloti_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_zloti_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_zloti_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_zloti_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_zloti_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_zloti_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_zloti_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_zloti_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = zloti_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_zloti_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_zloti_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #zloti
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_zloti_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = zloti_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_zloti_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_zloti_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:zloti_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_zloti_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:zloti_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_zloti_state > var:zloti_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_zloti_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes

                            #########
