                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_zloti_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_zloti_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_zloti_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_zloti_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_zloti_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_zloti_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = drachma_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner

                has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #drachma
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }

                    value = {
                        value = 1

                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }

                            }
                        }

                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes

                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_drachma_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_drachma_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

sell_overrated_drachma_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = drachma_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_drachma_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #drachma
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = drachma_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_drachma_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_drachma_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:drachma_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_drachma_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:drachma_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_drachma_state > var:drachma_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_drachma_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_drachma_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_drachma_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_drachma_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_drachma_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#peso
buy_undervalued_peso_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = peso_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #peso
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = peso_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:peso_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:peso_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_peso_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_peso_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = peso_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_peso_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #peso
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = peso_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_peso_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:peso_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:peso_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_peso_state > var:peso_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#mexican_peso
buy_undervalued_mexican_peso_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = mexican_peso_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_mexican_peso_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #mexican_peso
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_mexican_peso_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = mexican_peso_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_mexican_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:mexican_peso_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_mexican_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:mexican_peso_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_mexican_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_mexican_peso_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_mexican_peso_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_mexican_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_mexican_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_mexican_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_mexican_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_mexican_peso_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = mexican_peso_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_mexican_peso_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_mexican_peso_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #mexican_peso
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_mexican_peso_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = mexican_peso_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_mexican_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:mexican_peso_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_mexican_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:mexican_peso_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_mexican_peso_state > var:mexican_peso_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_mexican_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_mexican_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_mexican_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_mexican_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_mexican_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#philippine_peso
buy_undervalued_philippine_peso_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = philippine_peso_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_philippine_peso_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #philippine_peso
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_philippine_peso_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = philippine_peso_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_philippine_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:philippine_peso_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_philippine_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:philippine_peso_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_philippine_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_philippine_peso_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_philippine_peso_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_philippine_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_philippine_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_philippine_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_philippine_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_philippine_peso_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = philippine_peso_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_philippine_peso_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_philippine_peso_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #philippine_peso
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_philippine_peso_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }

                    name = philippine_peso_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }

                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_philippine_peso_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                    name = stockpiling_overrated_philippine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:philippine_peso_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }

                    name = stockpiling_overrated_philippine_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:philippine_peso_quantity_var

                        stockpiling_philippine_peso_state > var:philippine_peso_quantity_var

                        }

                        if = {

                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_philippine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_philippine_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_philippine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_philippine_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#argentine_peso
buy_undervalued_argentine_peso_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = argentine_peso_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_argentine_peso_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #argentine_peso
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_argentine_peso_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = argentine_peso_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_argentine_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:argentine_peso_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_argentine_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:argentine_peso_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_argentine_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_argentine_peso_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_argentine_peso_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_argentine_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_argentine_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_argentine_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_argentine_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_argentine_peso_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = argentine_peso_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_argentine_peso_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_argentine_peso_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #argentine_peso
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_argentine_peso_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = argentine_peso_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_argentine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:argentine_peso_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_argentine_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:argentine_peso_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_argentine_peso_state > var:argentine_peso_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_argentine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_argentine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_argentine_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_argentine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_argentine_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#chilean_peso
buy_undervalued_chilean_peso_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = chilean_peso_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_chilean_peso_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #chilean_peso
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_chilean_peso_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = chilean_peso_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_chilean_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:chilean_peso_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_chilean_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:chilean_peso_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_chilean_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_chilean_peso_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_chilean_peso_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_chilean_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_chilean_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_chilean_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_chilean_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = chilean_peso_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_chilean_peso_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_chilean_peso_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #chilean_peso
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_chilean_peso_currency

                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }

                    name = chilean_peso_quantity_var

                        multiply = 0.50

                    }

                    value = var:chilean_peso_quantity_var

                        stockpiling_chilean_peso_state > var:chilean_peso_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_chilean_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }

                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes

                            #########

                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_chilean_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########

                                name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_chilean_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_chilean_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_chilean_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

#colombian_peso
buy_undervalued_colombian_peso_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = colombian_peso_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_colombian_peso_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #colombian_peso
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_colombian_peso_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = colombian_peso_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_colombian_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:colombian_peso_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_colombian_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:colombian_peso_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_colombian_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_colombian_peso_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_colombian_peso_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_colombian_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_colombian_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_colombian_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_colombian_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

                            }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = cuban_peso_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_cuban_peso_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #cuban_peso
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_cuban_peso_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }

                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }

                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_cuban_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:cuban_peso_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }

                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_cuban_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:cuban_peso_quantity_var

                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_cuban_peso_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_cuban_peso_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }

                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes

                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_cuban_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_cuban_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
