sell_overrated_cuban_peso_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = cuban_peso_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_cuban_peso_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_cuban_peso_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #cuban_peso
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_cuban_peso_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = cuban_peso_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_cuban_peso_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_cuban_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:cuban_peso_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_cuban_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:cuban_peso_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_cuban_peso_state > var:cuban_peso_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_cuban_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_cuban_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_cuban_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_cuban_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_cuban_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#dominican_peso
buy_undervalued_dominican_peso_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = dominican_peso_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_dominican_peso_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #dominican_peso
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_dominican_peso_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = dominican_peso_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_dominican_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:dominican_peso_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_dominican_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:dominican_peso_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_dominican_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dominican_peso_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_dominican_peso_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dominican_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_dominican_peso_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dominican_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dominican_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_dominican_peso_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dominican_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_dominican_peso_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = dominican_peso_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_dominican_peso_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_dominican_peso_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #dominican_peso
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_dominican_peso_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = dominican_peso_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_dominican_peso_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_dominican_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:dominican_peso_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_dominican_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:dominican_peso_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_dominican_peso_state > var:dominican_peso_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dominican_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dominican_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_dominican_peso_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dominican_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dominican_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_dominican_peso_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dominican_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#uruguayan_peso
buy_undervalued_uruguayan_peso_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = uruguayan_peso_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_uruguayan_peso_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #uruguayan_peso
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_uruguayan_peso_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = uruguayan_peso_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_uruguayan_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:uruguayan_peso_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_uruguayan_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:uruguayan_peso_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_uruguayan_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_uruguayan_peso_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_uruguayan_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_uruguayan_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_uruguayan_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_uruguayan_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_uruguayan_peso_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = uruguayan_peso_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_uruguayan_peso_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #uruguayan_peso
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_uruguayan_peso_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = uruguayan_peso_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_uruguayan_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:uruguayan_peso_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_uruguayan_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:uruguayan_peso_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state > var:uruguayan_peso_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_uruguayan_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_uruguayan_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_uruguayan_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_uruguayan_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_uruguayan_peso_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#costa_rican_colón
buy_undervalued_costa_rican_colón_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = costa_rican_colón_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_costa_rican_colón_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #costa_rican_colón
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_costa_rican_colón_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = costa_rican_colón_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_costa_rican_colón_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:costa_rican_colón_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_costa_rican_colón_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:costa_rican_colón_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_costa_rican_colón_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_costa_rican_colón_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_costa_rican_colón_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_costa_rican_colón_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_costa_rican_colón_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_costa_rican_colón_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = costa_rican_colón_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_costa_rican_colón_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #costa_rican_colón
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_costa_rican_colón_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }

                        multiply = 0.50
                    }

                        value = 1

                    }
                }

                    value = var:costa_rican_colón_quantity_var

                        stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state > var:costa_rican_colón_quantity_var

                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_costa_rican_colón_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_costa_rican_colón_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_costa_rican_colón_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colón_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_costa_rican_colón_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#el_salvador_colón
buy_undervalued_el_salvador_colón_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = el_salvador_colón_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_el_salvador_colón_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #el_salvador_colón
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_el_salvador_colón_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = el_salvador_colón_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_el_salvador_colón_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:el_salvador_colón_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_el_salvador_colón_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:el_salvador_colón_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_el_salvador_colón_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_el_salvador_colón_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_el_salvador_colón_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_el_salvador_colón_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_el_salvador_colón_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_el_salvador_colón_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_el_salvador_colón_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = el_salvador_colón_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_el_salvador_colón_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #el_salvador_colón
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_el_salvador_colón_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = el_salvador_colón_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_el_salvador_colón_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:el_salvador_colón_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_el_salvador_colón_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:el_salvador_colón_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state > var:el_salvador_colón_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_el_salvador_colón_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_el_salvador_colón_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_el_salvador_colón_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_el_salvador_colón_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colón_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_el_salvador_colón_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#honduran_lempira
buy_undervalued_honduran_lempira_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = honduran_lempira_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_honduran_lempira_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #honduran_lempira
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_honduran_lempira_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = honduran_lempira_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_honduran_lempira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:honduran_lempira_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_honduran_lempira_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:honduran_lempira_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_honduran_lempira_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_honduran_lempira_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_honduran_lempira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_honduran_lempira_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_honduran_lempira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_honduran_lempira_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_honduran_lempira_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = honduran_lempira_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_honduran_lempira_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #honduran_lempira
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_honduran_lempira_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }

                    name = honduran_lempira_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }

                        value = 1

                        multiply = 0.50

                        value = 1

                    }
                }

                    name = stockpiling_overrated_honduran_lempira_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:honduran_lempira_quantity_var
                }

                        stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state > var:honduran_lempira_quantity_var

                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_honduran_lempira_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_honduran_lempira_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_honduran_lempira_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_honduran_lempira_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_honduran_lempira_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
