#nicaraguan_córdoba
buy_undervalued_nicaraguan_córdoba_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = nicaraguan_córdoba_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_nicaraguan_córdoba_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #nicaraguan_córdoba
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_nicaraguan_córdoba_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = nicaraguan_córdoba_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:nicaraguan_córdoba_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:nicaraguan_córdoba_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_nicaraguan_córdoba_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = nicaraguan_córdoba_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_nicaraguan_córdoba_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #nicaraguan_córdoba
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_nicaraguan_córdoba_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = nicaraguan_córdoba_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:nicaraguan_córdoba_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:nicaraguan_córdoba_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state > var:nicaraguan_córdoba_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_nicaraguan_córdoba_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#guatemalan_quetzal
buy_undervalued_guatemalan_quetzal_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = guatemalan_quetzal_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #guatemalan_quetzal
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = guatemalan_quetzal_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:guatemalan_quetzal_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_guatemalan_quetzal_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:guatemalan_quetzal_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_guatemalan_quetzal_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_guatemalan_quetzal_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_guatemalan_quetzal_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_guatemalan_quetzal_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = guatemalan_quetzal_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #guatemalan_quetzal
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = guatemalan_quetzal_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:guatemalan_quetzal_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_guatemalan_quetzal_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:guatemalan_quetzal_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state > var:guatemalan_quetzal_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_guatemalan_quetzal_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_guatemalan_quetzal_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#rupee
buy_undervalued_rupee_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = rupee_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #rupee
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = rupee_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_rupee_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:rupee_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_rupee_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:rupee_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_rupee_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_rupee_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_rupee_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_rupee_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_rupee_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_rupee_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_rupee_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_rupee_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = rupee_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_rupee_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #rupee
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = rupee_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_rupee_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:rupee_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_rupee_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:rupee_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_rupee_state > var:rupee_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_rupee_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_rupee_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#pakistan_rupee
buy_undervalued_pakistan_rupee_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = pakistan_rupee_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_pakistan_rupee_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #pakistan_rupee
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_pakistan_rupee_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = pakistan_rupee_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_pakistan_rupee_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:pakistan_rupee_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_pakistan_rupee_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:pakistan_rupee_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_pakistan_rupee_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_pakistan_rupee_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_pakistan_rupee_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_pakistan_rupee_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_pakistan_rupee_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_pakistan_rupee_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

                                    is_capital = yes

                                #########

                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_pakistan_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }

buy_undervalued_nepalese_rupee_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = nepalese_rupee_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_nepalese_rupee_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #nepalese_rupee
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_nepalese_rupee_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = nepalese_rupee_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_nepalese_rupee_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:nepalese_rupee_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_nepalese_rupee_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:nepalese_rupee_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_nepalese_rupee_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nepalese_rupee_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nepalese_rupee_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nepalese_rupee_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nepalese_rupee_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nepalese_rupee_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = nepalese_rupee_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner

    if = {

            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {

                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real

                }
            }
            #stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_state > 1000000
        }

            #nepalese_rupee

                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism

                        add = var:nepalese_rupee_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_nepalese_rupee_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:nepalese_rupee_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {

                        if = {

                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_nepalese_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_nepalese_rupee_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_nepalese_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_nepalese_rupee_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_nepalese_rupee_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#yen
buy_undervalued_yen_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = yen_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #yen
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = yen_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_yen_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:yen_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_yen_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:yen_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_yen_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yen_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_yen_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yen_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yen_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yen_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yen_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_yen_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = yen_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_yen_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #yen
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = yen_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_yen_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_yen_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:yen_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_yen_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:yen_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_yen_state > var:yen_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yen_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_yen_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_yen_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yen_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yen_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#peseta
buy_undervalued_peseta_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = peseta_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #peseta
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = peseta_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_peseta_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:peseta_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_peseta_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:peseta_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_peseta_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peseta_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_peseta_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peseta_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peseta_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peseta_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peseta_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_peseta_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = peseta_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_peseta_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #peseta
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = peseta_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_peseta_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_peseta_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:peseta_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_peseta_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:peseta_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_peseta_state > var:peseta_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_peseta_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_peseta_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_peseta_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_peseta_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_peseta_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = ruble_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_ruble_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #ruble
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_ruble_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }

                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }

                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:ruble_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_ruble_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:ruble_quantity_var
                }

                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_ruble_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state

                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ruble_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_ruble_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ruble_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_ruble_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ruble_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ruble_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_ruble_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ruble_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = ruble_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner

            #ruble

                    not  = {

                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union

                        multiply = 0.50
                    }

                    value = {
                        value = 1

                    }

                            }
                            #########

                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_ruble_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ruble_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_ruble_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ruble_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
