    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = leu_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_leu_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_leu_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #leu
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_leu_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = leu_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_leu_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_leu_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:leu_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_leu_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:leu_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_leu_state > var:leu_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_leu_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_leu_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_leu_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_leu_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_leu_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#lev
buy_undervalued_lev_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = lev_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_lev_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #lev
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_lev_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = lev_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_lev_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:lev_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_lev_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:lev_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_lev_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lev_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_lev_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lev_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_lev_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lev_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lev_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_lev_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lev_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_lev_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = lev_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_lev_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_lev_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #lev
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_lev_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = lev_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_lev_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_lev_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:lev_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_lev_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:lev_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_lev_state > var:lev_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lev_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_lev_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_lev_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_lev_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lev_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_lev_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lev_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#hungarian_forint
buy_undervalued_hungarian_forint_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = hungarian_forint_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_hungarian_forint_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #hungarian_forint
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_hungarian_forint_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = hungarian_forint_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_hungarian_forint_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:hungarian_forint_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_hungarian_forint_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:hungarian_forint_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_hungarian_forint_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_hungarian_forint_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_hungarian_forint_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_hungarian_forint_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_hungarian_forint_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_hungarian_forint_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_hungarian_forint_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = hungarian_forint_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_hungarian_forint_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #hungarian_forint
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_hungarian_forint_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = hungarian_forint_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_hungarian_forint_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:hungarian_forint_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_hungarian_forint_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:hungarian_forint_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state > var:hungarian_forint_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_hungarian_forint_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_hungarian_forint_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_hungarian_forint_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_hungarian_forint_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_hungarian_forint_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#dinar
buy_undervalued_dinar_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = dinar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #dinar
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = dinar_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:dinar_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:dinar_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_dinar_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = dinar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_dinar_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #dinar
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = dinar_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_dinar_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:dinar_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:dinar_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_dinar_state > var:dinar_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#algerian_dinar
buy_undervalued_algerian_dinar_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = algerian_dinar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_algerian_dinar_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #algerian_dinar
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_algerian_dinar_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = algerian_dinar_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_algerian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:algerian_dinar_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_algerian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:algerian_dinar_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_algerian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_algerian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_algerian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_algerian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_algerian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_algerian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_algerian_dinar_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = algerian_dinar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_algerian_dinar_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #algerian_dinar
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_algerian_dinar_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = algerian_dinar_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_algerian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:algerian_dinar_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_algerian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:algerian_dinar_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state > var:algerian_dinar_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_algerian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_algerian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_algerian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_algerian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_algerian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#bahraini_dinar
buy_undervalued_bahraini_dinar_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = bahraini_dinar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_bahraini_dinar_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #bahraini_dinar
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_bahraini_dinar_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = bahraini_dinar_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_bahraini_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:bahraini_dinar_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_bahraini_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:bahraini_dinar_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_bahraini_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_bahraini_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_bahraini_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_bahraini_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_bahraini_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_bahraini_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = bahraini_dinar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_bahraini_dinar_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #bahraini_dinar
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_bahraini_dinar_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = bahraini_dinar_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_bahraini_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:bahraini_dinar_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_bahraini_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:bahraini_dinar_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state > var:bahraini_dinar_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_bahraini_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_bahraini_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_bahraini_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_bahraini_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_bahraini_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#iraqi_dinar
buy_undervalued_iraqi_dinar_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = iraqi_dinar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_iraqi_dinar_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #iraqi_dinar
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_iraqi_dinar_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = iraqi_dinar_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_iraqi_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:iraqi_dinar_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_iraqi_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:iraqi_dinar_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_iraqi_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_iraqi_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_iraqi_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_iraqi_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_iraqi_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_iraqi_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = iraqi_dinar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_iraqi_dinar_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #iraqi_dinar
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_iraqi_dinar_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }

                    name = iraqi_dinar_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }

                        value = 1

                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_iraqi_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_iraqi_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_iraqi_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_iraqi_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = jordanian_dinar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_jordanian_dinar_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #jordanian_dinar
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_jordanian_dinar_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }

                }

                        value = 1

           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }

                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_jordanian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_jordanian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {

        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {

                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real

            }

        }
