            #jordanian_dinar
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_jordanian_dinar_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = jordanian_dinar_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_jordanian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:jordanian_dinar_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_jordanian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:jordanian_dinar_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state > var:jordanian_dinar_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_jordanian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_jordanian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_jordanian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_jordanian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_jordanian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#libyan_dinar
buy_undervalued_libyan_dinar_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = libyan_dinar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_libyan_dinar_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #libyan_dinar
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_libyan_dinar_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = libyan_dinar_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_libyan_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:libyan_dinar_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_libyan_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:libyan_dinar_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_libyan_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_libyan_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_libyan_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_libyan_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_libyan_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_libyan_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_libyan_dinar_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = libyan_dinar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_libyan_dinar_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #libyan_dinar
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_libyan_dinar_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = libyan_dinar_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_libyan_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:libyan_dinar_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_libyan_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:libyan_dinar_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state > var:libyan_dinar_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_libyan_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_libyan_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_libyan_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_libyan_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_libyan_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#serbian_dinar
buy_undervalued_serbian_dinar_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = serbian_dinar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_serbian_dinar_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #serbian_dinar
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_serbian_dinar_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = serbian_dinar_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_serbian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:serbian_dinar_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_serbian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:serbian_dinar_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_serbian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_serbian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_serbian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_serbian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_serbian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_serbian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_serbian_dinar_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = serbian_dinar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_serbian_dinar_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #serbian_dinar
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_serbian_dinar_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = serbian_dinar_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_serbian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:serbian_dinar_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_serbian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:serbian_dinar_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state > var:serbian_dinar_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_serbian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_serbian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_serbian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_serbian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_serbian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

#tunisian_dinar
buy_undervalued_tunisian_dinar_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = tunisian_dinar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_tunisian_dinar_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #tunisian_dinar
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_tunisian_dinar_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_tunisian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tunisian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tunisian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tunisian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

            }

                                name = stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1

                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_tunisian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

#yugoslav_dinar
buy_undervalued_yugoslav_dinar_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = yugoslav_dinar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_yugoslav_dinar_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #yugoslav_dinar
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_yugoslav_dinar_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_yugoslav_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yugoslav_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yugoslav_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yugoslav_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_yugoslav_dinar_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = yugoslav_dinar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_yugoslav_dinar_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #yugoslav_dinar
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_yugoslav_dinar_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_yugoslav_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state > var:yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_yugoslav_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yugoslav_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#tuareg_ouguiya
buy_undervalued_tuareg_ouguiya_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = tuareg_ouguiya_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #tuareg_ouguiya
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = tuareg_ouguiya_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:tuareg_ouguiya_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:tuareg_ouguiya_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

        save_scope_as = seller

                }

        }

                        }

                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                    name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

#moroccan_dirham
buy_undervalued_moroccan_dirham_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = moroccan_dirham_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_moroccan_dirham_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #moroccan_dirham
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_moroccan_dirham_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = moroccan_dirham_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_moroccan_dirham_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:moroccan_dirham_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_moroccan_dirham_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:moroccan_dirham_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_moroccan_dirham_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_moroccan_dirham_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_moroccan_dirham_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_moroccan_dirham_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_moroccan_dirham_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_moroccan_dirham_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = moroccan_dirham_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1

                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real

                            #########

                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {

                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_moroccan_dirham_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                    name = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_moroccan_dirham_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = omanian_rial_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_omanian_rial_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #omanian_rial
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_omanian_rial_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }

                }

                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:omanian_rial_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation

                            }
                        }

                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_omanian_rial_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_omanian_rial_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
