sell_overrated_omanian_rial_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = omanian_rial_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_omanian_rial_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_omanian_rial_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #omanian_rial
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_omanian_rial_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = omanian_rial_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_omanian_rial_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:omanian_rial_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_omanian_rial_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:omanian_rial_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_omanian_rial_state > var:omanian_rial_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_omanian_rial_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_omanian_rial_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_omanian_rial_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_omanian_rial_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_omanian_rial_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#qatari_riyal
buy_undervalued_qatari_riyal_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = qatari_riyal_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_qatari_riyal_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #qatari_riyal
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_qatari_riyal_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = qatari_riyal_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_qatari_riyal_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:qatari_riyal_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_qatari_riyal_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:qatari_riyal_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_qatari_riyal_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_qatari_riyal_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_qatari_riyal_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_qatari_riyal_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_qatari_riyal_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_qatari_riyal_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_qatari_riyal_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = qatari_riyal_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_qatari_riyal_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #qatari_riyal
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_qatari_riyal_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = qatari_riyal_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_qatari_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:qatari_riyal_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_qatari_riyal_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:qatari_riyal_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state > var:qatari_riyal_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_qatari_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_qatari_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_qatari_riyal_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_qatari_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_qatari_riyal_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#saudi_riyal
buy_undervalued_saudi_riyal_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = saudi_riyal_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_saudi_riyal_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #saudi_riyal
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_saudi_riyal_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = saudi_riyal_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_saudi_riyal_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:saudi_riyal_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_saudi_riyal_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:saudi_riyal_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_saudi_riyal_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_saudi_riyal_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_saudi_riyal_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_saudi_riyal_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_saudi_riyal_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_saudi_riyal_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_saudi_riyal_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = saudi_riyal_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_saudi_riyal_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #saudi_riyal
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_saudi_riyal_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = saudi_riyal_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_saudi_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:saudi_riyal_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_saudi_riyal_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:saudi_riyal_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state > var:saudi_riyal_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_saudi_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_saudi_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_saudi_riyal_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_saudi_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_saudi_riyal_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#yuan
buy_undervalued_yuan_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = yuan_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #yuan
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = yuan_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_yuan_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:yuan_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_yuan_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:yuan_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_yuan_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yuan_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_yuan_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yuan_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yuan_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yuan_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yuan_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = yuan_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_yuan_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #yuan
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = yuan_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_yuan_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_yuan_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:yuan_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_yuan_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:yuan_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_yuan_state > var:yuan_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yuan_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_yuan_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_yuan_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yuan_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yuan_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#korean_won
buy_undervalued_korean_won_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = korean_won_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_korean_won_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #korean_won
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_korean_won_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = korean_won_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_korean_won_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:korean_won_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_korean_won_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:korean_won_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_korean_won_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_korean_won_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_korean_won_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_korean_won_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_korean_won_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_korean_won_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_korean_won_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_korean_won_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_korean_won_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_korean_won_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = korean_won_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_korean_won_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_korean_won_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #korean_won
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_korean_won_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = korean_won_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_korean_won_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_korean_won_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:korean_won_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_korean_won_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:korean_won_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_korean_won_state > var:korean_won_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_korean_won_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_korean_won_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_korean_won_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_korean_won_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_korean_won_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_korean_won_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_korean_won_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#baht
buy_undervalued_baht_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = baht_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_baht_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #baht
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_baht_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = baht_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_baht_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:baht_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_baht_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:baht_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_baht_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_baht_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_baht_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_baht_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_baht_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_baht_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_baht_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_baht_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_baht_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_baht_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = baht_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_baht_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_baht_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #baht
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_baht_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = baht_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_baht_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_baht_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:baht_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_baht_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:baht_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_baht_state > var:baht_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_baht_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_baht_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_baht_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_baht_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_baht_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_baht_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_baht_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#tical
buy_undervalued_tical_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = tical_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_tical_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #tical
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_tical_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = tical_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_tical_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:tical_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_tical_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:tical_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_tical_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tical_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_tical_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tical_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_tical_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tical_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tical_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_tical_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tical_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = tical_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {

                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_tical_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #tical
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_tical_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }

                    name = tical_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_tical_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_tical_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:tical_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_tical_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:tical_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_tical_state > var:tical_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_tical_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_tical_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_tical_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_tical_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_tical_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_tical_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_tical_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_qiran_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_qiran_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

                        value = 1
                        add = var:qiran_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_qiran_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:qiran_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_qiran_state > var:qiran_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_qiran_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_qiran_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_qiran_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_qiran_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_qiran_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#south_african_rand
buy_undervalued_south_african_rand_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = south_african_rand_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_south_african_rand_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #south_african_rand
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_south_african_rand_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = south_african_rand_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_south_african_rand_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:south_african_rand_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_south_african_rand_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:south_african_rand_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_african_rand_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_african_rand_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_south_african_rand_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_african_rand_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_african_rand_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_african_rand_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_african_rand_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_south_african_rand_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = south_african_rand_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_south_african_rand_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_south_african_rand_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #south_african_rand
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_south_african_rand_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = south_african_rand_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_south_african_rand_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:south_african_rand_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_south_african_rand_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:south_african_rand_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_south_african_rand_state > var:south_african_rand_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_south_african_rand_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_south_african_rand_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_south_african_rand_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_south_african_rand_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_south_african_rand_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#nigerian_naira
buy_undervalued_nigerian_naira_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = nigerian_naira_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_nigerian_naira_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #nigerian_naira
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_nigerian_naira_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = nigerian_naira_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_nigerian_naira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:nigerian_naira_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_nigerian_naira_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:nigerian_naira_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_nigerian_naira_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nigerian_naira_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nigerian_naira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nigerian_naira_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nigerian_naira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nigerian_naira_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

            }
            #stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state > 1000000
        }

                        }

                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_nigerian_naira_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########

                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_nigerian_naira_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########

                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1

                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_nigerian_naira_state_buy_vriablity

                            }
