buy_undervalued_ghanaian_cedi_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = ghanaian_cedi_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_ghanaian_cedi_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #ghanaian_cedi
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_ghanaian_cedi_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = ghanaian_cedi_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_ghanaian_cedi_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:ghanaian_cedi_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }

                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_ghanaian_cedi_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:ghanaian_cedi_quantity_var

                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_ghanaian_cedi_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state

                        }
                    }

                            limit = {

                                is_capital = yes

                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ghanaian_cedi_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ghanaian_cedi_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ghanaian_cedi_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

                                    is_capital = yes

#sierra_leonean_leone
buy_undervalued_sierra_leonean_leone_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = sierra_leonean_leone_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_sierra_leonean_leone_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #sierra_leonean_leone
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_sierra_leonean_leone_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = sierra_leonean_leone_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:sierra_leonean_leone_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_sierra_leonean_leone_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:sierra_leonean_leone_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_sierra_leonean_leone_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_sierra_leonean_leone_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_sierra_leonean_leone_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_sierra_leonean_leone_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = sierra_leonean_leone_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_sierra_leonean_leone_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #sierra_leonean_leone
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_sierra_leonean_leone_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = sierra_leonean_leone_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:sierra_leonean_leone_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_sierra_leonean_leone_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:sierra_leonean_leone_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state > var:sierra_leonean_leone_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_sierra_leonean_leone_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_sierra_leonean_leone_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#west_african_eco
buy_undervalued_west_african_eco_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = west_african_eco_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_west_african_eco_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #west_african_eco
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_west_african_eco_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = west_african_eco_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_west_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:west_african_eco_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_west_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:west_african_eco_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_west_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_west_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_west_african_eco_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_west_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_west_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_west_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_west_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

        save_scope_as = seller

        variable = west_african_eco_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1

                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real

            }

                            }
                            #########

                        }

                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes

                                #########

                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_west_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                    name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_west_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

#central_african_eco
buy_undervalued_central_african_eco_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = central_african_eco_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_central_african_eco_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #central_african_eco
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_central_african_eco_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = central_african_eco_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_central_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:central_african_eco_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_central_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:central_african_eco_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_central_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_central_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_central_african_eco_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_central_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_central_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_central_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_central_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = central_african_eco_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner

        limit = {

            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {

                }
            }
            #stockpiling_central_african_eco_state > 1000000
        }

                        }

                        every_scope_state = {

                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes

                                #########

                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1

                            }

                }
            }

        save_scope_as = buyer

        variable = east_african_eco_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1

    if = {

                has_law = law_type:law_east_african_eco_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls

        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #east_african_eco

                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_east_african_eco_currency

                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union

                        value = 1

                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########

                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1

                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_east_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }

            }
        }

sell_overrated_east_african_eco_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = east_african_eco_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_east_african_eco_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_east_african_eco_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #east_african_eco
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_east_african_eco_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = east_african_eco_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_east_african_eco_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_east_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:east_african_eco_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_east_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:east_african_eco_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_east_african_eco_state > var:east_african_eco_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_east_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_east_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_east_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_east_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_east_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
#ethiopian_birr
buy_undervalued_ethiopian_birr_currency = {
    root = {
        save_scope_as = buyer
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = ethiopian_birr_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_ethiopian_birr_currency
				money_supply_state > 10000000
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
        }
        
        scope:buyer = {
            #ethiopian_birr
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_ethiopian_birr_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = ethiopian_birr_quantity_var
                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_ethiopian_birr_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:ethiopian_birr_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_ethiopian_birr_state_buyer_vriablity
                    value = var:ethiopian_birr_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_ethiopian_birr_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ethiopian_birr_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state
           					money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ethiopian_birr_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ethiopian_birr_state_buyer_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ethiopian_birr_state_1_buyer_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ethiopian_birr_state_buyer_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
sell_overrated_ethiopian_birr_currency = {

    root = {
        save_scope_as = seller
    }

    random_in_list = {
        variable = ethiopian_birr_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list_ordered_1
        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                has_law = law_type:law_ethiopian_birr_currency
                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
                not = {
                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
                }
            }
            #stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state > 1000000
        }
        
        scope:seller = {
            #ethiopian_birr
            if = {
                limit = {
                    not  = {
                        has_law = law_type:law_ethiopian_birr_currency
                        or = {
                            is_subject = yes
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
                        }
                    }
                }
                    
                set_variable = {
                    name = ethiopian_birr_quantity_var
                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state
                        multiply = 0.50
                    }
                }

                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_ethiopian_birr_state_1_buy_in_gold
                    value = {
                        value = 1
                        add = var:ethiopian_birr_quantity_var
                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
                    }
                }
                
                set_variable = {
                    name = stockpiling_overrated_ethiopian_birr_state_buy_vriablity
                    value = var:ethiopian_birr_quantity_var
                }
        
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state > var:ethiopian_birr_quantity_var
                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ethiopian_birr_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
                        }
                    }
                    every_scope_state = {
                        if = {
                            limit = {
                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                is_capital = yes
                            }
                            #########
    
                            change_variable = {
                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_ethiopian_birr_state_1_buy_in_gold
                            }
                            #########
                            
                            change_variable = {
                                name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1
                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_ethiopian_birr_state_buy_vriablity
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
                        every_scope_state = {
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
                                    is_capital = yes
                                }
                                #########
    
                                change_variable = {
                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ethiopian_birr_state_1_buy_in_gold
                                }
                                #########

                                change_variable = {
                                    name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1
                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ethiopian_birr_state_buy_vriablity
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

money_creation_in_circulation_for_rebalancing = {
    set_variable = {
        name = money_value_target_complete
        value = {
            value = 0
            add = money_value_target
            subtract = money_supply
        }
    }

   # change_variable = {
   #     name = money_circulating
   #     add = var:money_value_target_complete
   # }

    if = {
        limit = {
            has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_money_c_var_1
            add = var:money_value_target_complete
        }
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_dollar_c_var_1
            add = var:money_value_target_complete
        }
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            has_law = law_type:law_australian_dollar_currency
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_australian_dollar_c_var_1
            add = var:money_value_target_complete
        }
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            has_law = law_type:law_canadian_dollar_currency
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_canadian_dollar_c_var_1
            add = var:money_value_target_complete
        }
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            has_law = law_type:law_new_zealand_dollar_currency
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = circulating_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_1
            add = var:money_value_target_complete
        }
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            has_law = law_type:law_liberian_dollar_currency

            name = circulating_liberian_dollar_c_var_1
